title: Cost Controller - UAE National
description:
* **General Admin \\& Other Support Functions**
* **Permanent Contract**
* **Entry\\-Level**
* **Dubai**

  
**About Us**

 **Are you ready to take your career to the next level? Your future starts here.**  

  

Join Egis, where your ambition meets unparalleled growth opportunities. As we continue to expand within Canada, we're looking for talented professionals like you to be a part of our innovative team. Imagine working alongside over 1,000 top\\-tier engineers, architects, and planners, all dedicated to shaping the future of infrastructure and development.  

  

At Egis, your skills and aspirations will find the perfect environment to thrive. Elevate your career with us and be a driving force in our exciting journey.


Our values showcase everything we believe in:

**A Responsible Company** \\- We care about people, and we care about our impact; acting responsibly wherever we work and whatever we do.

**A People\\-First Company** \\- This is an environment of mutual respect where every team member matters, no matter who they are.

**A Creative Company** \\- Creativity is in our DNA. This is the fuel that helps us tackle the major challenges of our time.

 **About the Role**

  

We are seeking a detail\\-oriented and analytical Cost Controller to join our team in Dubai, United Arab Emirates. As a Cost Controller, you will be reporting to the Portfolio Performance Controller and play a crucial role in supporting the financial management and cost control processes of our projects. You will work collaboratively with project managers, finance teams, and other stakeholders to ensure projects are completed within approved budgets while maintaining financial health throughout the project lifecycle.

* Review and control project budgets in collaboration with project managers and your line manager, ensuring alignment with project objectives and financial constraints.
* Participate to regular variance analysis to compare actual costs against planned costs, investigating reasons for variances and implementing corrective measures.
* Support the review and analysis of earned value metrics to support project forecasting, variance analysis, and reporting to project stakeholders.
* Participate to the project cash flow, ensuring costs are aligned with project milestones and payments to vendors and subcontractors are made according to contract terms.
* Support the analysis of financial statements to identify potential improvements and develop strategies to optimize cost\\-effectiveness against approved budgets.
* Assist in the preparation of annual budgets.
* Collaborate with project managers to identify cost\\-saving opportunities and recommend measures to reduce expenses.
* Perform cost\\-benefit analysis on prospective projects and provide associated metrics to support the decision makers.
* Support the preparation of comprehensive financial reports to management to aid decision\\-making processes.

 **What do we need from you**

  

* UAE National mandatory, only UAE nationals will be reviewed and considered
* Bachelor's degree in Accounting, Finance, or a related field
* Fresh Graduate or Junior experience in cost control or financial management, preferably within the Construction / Maintenance industry
* Strong analytical and problem\\-solving abilities with a detail\\-oriented approach
* Thorough understanding of accounting principles, budgeting procedures, and Earned Value Management (EVM) principles
* Excellent communication skills, with the ability to convey complex financial information to various stakeholders
* Proficiency in MS Office Suite, particularly Excel for financial modelling and analysis
* Experience with financial forecasting, variance analysis, and project cash flow management
* Knowledge of industry\\-specific financial regulations (IFRS15\\) and reporting standards (preferred)

 **What's in it for you?**

  

Immediate joiners preferred


the role is to ensure effective cost management and margin optimization across the division's infrastructure projects by acting as the key financial liaison between Project Managers and your Management. This role ensures the integrity of project cost data, timely cost tracking, proactive margin control, and compliance with financial standards. It also supports continuous improvement through advanced Excel and Power BI utilization.

title: Kitchen Admin
description:
**About Calo**


Launched in Bahrain in November of 2019, Calo is on a mission to make healthy easy. We’re a team of dedicated people driving this mission by providing better, faster, and cheaper ways to access food through technology.

**Role overview**


To function as the Kitchen Administrator at Calo to coordinate, oversee and perform administrative support for the Head Chef and serve as the primary point of operational and administrative contact. The successful candidate will enable smooth communication between all parties by ensuring accurate and timely transmission of information while developing and managing all culinary staff records.

 **Main Responsibilities**

* The candidate will be responsible for printing recipes, filling up forms, pulling data from the dashboard and reporting summary to the head chef.
* Enter and retrieve information contained in computer databases
* Create and maintain computer\\- and paper\\-based filing and organization systems for records, reports, documents, etc.
* Creating kitchen meeting reports (weekly)
* Daily wastage sheet (Plus inputting it on the KDS)
* Compile, copy, sort, file and cross\\-check records of Kitchen activities .
* Assist Team in printing the recipes, guidelines, and daily tasks.
* Assist the stewarding team with paper work.
* Assist and maintain the leave records for Culinary and Stewarding teams.
* Maintaining and updating the data.
* Maintaining and informing chefs regarding maintenance work that needs to be done.
* Follow up with Chefs regarding the expiry dates of items and updating it into systems.
* Ensures prompt completion and delivery of documents and correspondence

 **Ideal Candidate**

**Qualifications \\& Requirements**

* Must have a minimum of 2 years of experience in administrative roles; in the hospitality industry is an advantage.
* Must be a proficient communicator in English
* Maintain a positive and professional approach with coworkers
* Outstanding communication and leadership skills
* Experience in large fast food chains is highly desirable
* Able to communicate in multiple languages is a plus
* Proficient in the use of MS Office Suite programs
* Must be currently present in Dubai

 **Personality**

* Strong communicator
* Pleasant personality and able to lead with empathy and patience.

title: Production Admin Assistant
description:
WE ARE HIRING

Be a part of a unique and incredible opportunity by joining our rapidly growing team!

2DOT4 is an established company within UAE and truly one of a kind, paving the way for the next generation of Diamonds to be curated within the UAE. With state\\-of\\-the\\-art technology and precede the way to a more ethical and sustainable future within the GCC region, the potential growth for this company is beyond measure!

WHAT WE ARE LOOKING FOR

We need an Production Administrative Assistant with precious stones experience, who will organize and maintain records for one of our fast\\-moving departments. You will contribute towards the entire department’s infrastructure, handling and updating results along with crucial information. You should be highly organized with analyzing data and driving production to optimize performance results. In collaboration with other departments, you will be responsible for preparing some reports for the department’s activities within 2DOT4\\.

* Stock Control and Inventory Management
* Experience with data audit practices, inventory reconciliation, and cycle counting
* Coordinating internal supply chain for your department.
* Working with controlled processes for traceability, product life management and anticipating advance requirements for consumables.
* Strong data entry skills and experience in production planning.
* Main POC for team communication and writing emails
* Inter\\-department coordination to ensure production requests and timeframes are in parallel.
* Work closely with a small team of decision makers and provide administrative support via Microsoft Office, Emails, PowerPoint, Excel,Odoo.
* Understand basic handling of technical equipment
* Motivating the team to reach KPIs to identify trends or provide recommendations
* Willing to take risks, fail, and learn from mistakes

WHO YOU ARE

A highly motivated and organized Individual with a genuine interest in the understanding of precious stone production. Able to implement ‘Lean Six Sigma’ methods to improve or streamline making things beautiful and structuring your work. To understand our business requirements with determination in achieving goals. There will be high demand in responsibilities within your team therefore you will need to ensure all tasks are divided in order to achieve great success. The way we work together determines the way we succeed so you need to have excellent self\\-leadership skills you see what needs to be done, and you/ team members get it done. A valuable positive attitude along with an excellent ability to adapt and work in an international environment and setting. You are a highly motivated, driven and detail\\-oriented person, willing to make a difference.

We would also love to see that you have/are:

* Minimum of 2\\+ years working with precious stones in the UAE is a MUST
* Experience of working within a startup environment preferred
* Highly driven and self\\-motivator
* Proficient in using ERP systems such as Odoo
* Highly organized with strong attention to details
* Comfortable with fast\\-paced environment continually adapting to changing requirements, schedules and priorities
* Excellent verbal and written communication skills in English/Hindi. Other language skills will be considered an advantage
* Accounting experience would be an additional benefit but not essential
* Ability to work under pressure with a high volume of workload without losing quality within your overall performance

What we are offering

* Highly competitive package
* Transportation can be provided to our offices in NIP
* Opportunity to work in a close\\-knit team with decision\\-making impact
* A chance to grow in a fast\\-growing, innovative company within the diamond industry

Candidate MUST be based within the UAE and have experience working with precious stones

Job Type: Full\\-time

Pay: AED8,000\\.00 \\- AED10,000\\.00 per month

Application Question(s):

* Do you drive?

Experience:

* working with precious stones/Diamonds: 2 years (Required)
* working in a Production facility: 3 years (Required)

Location:

* Dubai (Required)

title: Administration Assistant
description:
* **General Admin \\& Other Support Functions**
* **Permanent Contract**

* **Dubai**

  
**About Us**

  

Waagner Biro Bridge Services has been a trusted leader in the UAE construction industry for over 50 years. Headquartered in Dubai, the company specializes in delivering innovative engineering and construction solutions for both government and private sector clients. Backed by a highly skilled team of civil, mechanical, structural, and electrical engineers, Waagner Biro Bridge Services provides comprehensive services that span design, construction, and ongoing maintenance. Known for its integrated approach and commitment to quality, the company has set a benchmark for excellence in construction engineering across the region.


For more information, visit: **https://waagnerbiro\\-bridgeservices.com**

 **About the Role**

  

The responsibilities of the Administration Assistant include, but are not limited to:

***Document Control:***

* Establish, maintain, and manage document control systems in compliance with company standards.
* Receive, register, distribute, and archive project documentation (drawings, technical documents, contracts, reports, correspondence).
* Track document revisions, approvals, and submissions to ensure accuracy and version control.
* Prepare and maintain logs, registers, and reports on document status for the Division Director.
* Liaise with project teams, consultants, and clients to ensure timely submission and receipt of documents

***Secretarial \\& Administrative Support:***

* Manage the Division Director’s calendar, appointments, and travel arrangements.
* Draft, review, and format letters, memos, reports, and presentations.
* Screen calls, emails, and correspondence, ensuring urgent matters are prioritized.
* Organize meetings, prepare agendas, and take minutes when required.
* Handle confidential information with professionalism and discretion.

***Coordination \\& Communication:***

* Act as the point of contact between the Division Director and internal/external stakeholders.
* Follow up on pending tasks, correspondence, and deliverables.
* Support the preparation of tender submissions, project progress reports, and executive presentations.
* Coordinate with HR, Finance, Procurement, and Project Managers to streamline processes and provide updates to the Director.

 **What do we need from you**

  

Diploma or Bachelor’s degree in Business Administration


Experience in similar business for at least 5 years

 **What's in it for you?**

  

Good communication and team working skills


Strong organizational and multitasking abilities


The ability to work to tight deadlines


Logical thinking and being able to analyze details.


Proficiency in MS Office (Word, Excel, PowerPoint, Outlook)


Reporting skills.

title: Property Consultant
description:
At **Positive Heights Properties LLC**, we’re redefining the real estate experience in Dubai.  
We’re a forward\\-thinking brokerage powered by innovation, teamwork, and a deep passion for property. Our mission is simple — to deliver exceptional service, build lasting relationships, and empower our people to reach new heights.

If you’re driven, confident, and hungry for success, this is your opportunity to join a fast\\-growing team in one of the most dynamic real estate markets in the world.

**The Role**

As a **Property Consultant**, you’ll act as a trusted advisor to clients — helping them buy, sell, or rent properties while delivering world\\-class service. You’ll combine market expertise, people skills, and negotiation talent to close deals and grow both your career and our brand presence in Dubai.

**Key Responsibilities**

* Source and generate new client leads through networking, marketing campaigns, and referrals.
* Build and maintain strong, long\\-term relationships with clients and property owners.
* Advise clients on market trends, pricing strategies, and investment opportunities.
* Conduct professional property viewings and provide honest, insightful feedback.
* Negotiate sales and lease agreements and ensure smooth end\\-to\\-end transactions.
* Stay up to date with RERA regulations, market developments, and competitor activity.
* Meet and exceed individual and team performance targets.

**Requirements**

* Minimum **1 year of experience** as a Property Consultant or Real Estate Agent in Dubai.
* Strong knowledge of the **Dubai real estate market** and RERA guidelines.
* Exceptional communication and negotiation skills.
* Highly motivated, results\\-driven, and eager to succeed in a competitive environment.
* RERA certification (or willingness to obtain it).
* Valid UAE driving license and own car preferred.
* Fluent in English; other languages are an advantage.

**What We Offer**

* **High\\-commission structure** with unlimited earning potential.
* **Full marketing, admin, and portal support** — focus on closing deals, not paperwork.
* Access to premium property listings and CRM tools.
* Continuous **training and mentorship** from industry leaders.
* A vibrant, collaborative, and growth\\-oriented work culture.
* Regular team events, incentives, and career development opportunities.

**How to Apply**

Ready to make your mark in Dubai’s real estate market?  
Apply now and become part of a team that’s transforming how real estate is done.

Send your CV to **Sales@positiveheightsproperties.com** or apply directly via Indeed.

Job Type: Full\\-time

title: Executive Assistant - Senior EA for Real Estate Agent
description:
Xperience Realty is hiring a high\\-calibre Executive Assistant to support one of their real estate agents in Dubai. This is an operator\\-first role that blends top\\-level admin, client relationship management, digital marketing support (social \\+ SEO), and light web/backend ownership, the EA will be the agent’s right hand across operations, marketing and lead generation.

**1\\) Summary of experience**

● 3\\+ years of experience as an Executive Assistant, Personal Assistant, Operations Coordinator or similar, ideally supporting C\\-suite or high\\-net\\-worth professionals.

● Preferably 2\\+ years in real estate, proptech, luxury services, brokerage, or a marketing/agency environment.

● Demonstrable social media \\+ content experience (running channels, content calendars, copywriting) and SEO exposure (on\\-page, analytics, basic keyword work).

● The ideal candidate brings hands\\-on web familiarity and is confident navigating the backend of websites and ensuring everything runs smoothly from a performance and SEO standpoint.

● Proven use of CRMs (HubSpot, Pipedrive, Salesforce or similar), scheduling tools, and automation platforms.

● Fluent English is required; Arabic, Mandarin and/or other languages are a strong advantage.

**2\\) What to expect :\\-**

● This is high\\-pace, high\\-touch: you’ll juggle calendar triage for your real estate agent, coordinate with HNW clients, last\\-minute site visits, urgent marketing campaigns, and inbound lead triage, often outside standard 9–5\\.

You are both operator and strategist: execute day\\-to\\-day admin flawlessly, and also proactively propose/implement content and lead\\-gen improvements.

● Discretion is non\\-negotiable. You’ll handle confidential documents, client details, and sensitive negotiations.

● Expect a broad remit, from booking international travel and preparing investor packs to publishing Instagram reels and helping drive lead generation.

**3\\) Role \\& responsibilities (how you’ll support the agent)**

A. Administrative \\& Client Support

● Full calendar management, appointment triage, travel booking and itinerary planning (local \\& international).

● Email management and prioritisation: draft replies, manage follow\\-ups, and ensure SLA (service level agreement) for client responses.

● Prepare property proposals, investor packs, P\\&L summaries, meeting briefs and presentation slides.

● Manage documents (NDAs, contracts) and liaise with legal/transactions teams.

● On\\-site assistance during showings, open houses and events.

B. Sales \\& Lead Management

● First\\-line qualification of inbound leads (phone, web forms, social DMs). Cold\\-call outreach and follow\\-up when required.

● Maintain and cleanse CRM data; create and execute lead routing and nurture sequences.

● Book and confirm viewings, prepare post\\-viewing follow\\-ups and feedback capture.

C. Marketing \\& Content (hands\\-on)

● Coordinate with the social media team to manage messages and comments that trickle through their social media efforts.

● Coordinate with photographers, videographers, and the editorial team to meet timelines on video production.

● SEO and web maintenance: consistently ensure the website is up to date with the latest content and has no glitches.

● Produce bi\\-weekly performance reports (social, leads, website) and action items.

D. Technical \\& Web/Backend Support

● Maintain listings on Bayut, Property Finder, Dubizzle and other global portals; keep inventory accurate.

● Basic WordPress/CMS edits (pages, listings, forms), manage plugins, and coordinate with developers for larger fixes.

● Identify gaps in lead generation process and help implement simple positive changes to overcome gaps.

● Troubleshoot hosting/DNS/email issues at a basic level and provide clear ticketing details to devs when escalation is required.

E. Operations \\& Special Projects

● Assist with event logistics, partnerships and festival activations.

● Support the agent’s wider team (marketing, operations, legal) as needed — act as a bridge and gatekeeper.

● Proactively suggest process improvements and help implement them.

**4\\) Skills — broken down clearly**

Soft skills (must\\-have)

● Exceptional verbal \\& written communication — polished, confident phone presence for cold calls and HNW interactions.

● Emotional intelligence \\& diplomacy — handle delicate client conversations, complaints and negotiations tactfully.

● Proactivity \\& ownership — anticipates needs and acts without waiting for instructions.

● Prioritisation \\& resilience — adapt quickly, multi\\-task and focus under pressure.

● Discretion \\& integrity — strict confidentiality with client and company information.

● Client\\-facing polish — professional presentation, punctuality and attention to detail.

● Positive “closer” mentality — comfortable pushing for appointments, confirmations and next steps.

Technical skills (must\\-have / important)

● CRM proficiency — HubSpot, Pipedrive or Salesforce; comfortable building pipelines and automations.

● Social media and basic video creation or direction.

● SEO basics — keyword research, on\\-page SEO, metadata, Google Search Console, basic analytics.

● Web/CMS skills — backend familiarity

● Graphic \\& video tools (basic) — Canva, CapCut, simple Adobe or Premiere skills are a plus.

● Property portals \\& listings: experience listing and optimising properties on Bayut, Property Finder, Dubizzle or other global portals would be an advantage.

● Proactive system improvement: The ideal candidate naturally identifies inefficiencies in daily workflows and researches, tests, and implements new software or integrations that can improve productivity, data accuracy, and overall team performance.

**5\\) Qualifications \\& other requirements**

● Bachelor’s degree preferred (Business, Marketing, Communications, IT or related) but demonstrable experience can substitute.

● Right to work in UAE (or willingness to relocate; employer may sponsor visa).

● Clean, professional references from previous managers/clients.

● Availability for occasional evenings/weekends and domestic travel.

● Portfolio of social posts, content calendars or case studies demonstrating past work

6\\) Nice\\-to\\-have / differentiators

● RERA familiarity or previous exposure to Dubai property regulations.

● Arabic and/or Mandarin speaker.

● Experience supporting agents targeting international investors (UK, India, Russia, GCC).

7\\) KPIs \\& how success will be measured

● Lead response SLA — initial contact within X hours (defined by agency).

● Leads qualified \\& appointments set per month.

● Calendar \\& admin accuracy — error rate in bookings and client no\\-shows.

● Content cadence \\& engagement — posts published on schedule; engagement uplift.

● Website \\& listing health — lead volume from organic/paid channels; SEO keyword improvements.

● CRM hygiene — % of contacts with complete profiles and correct tags.

● Project delivery — timely completion of campaigns, events and special projects.

8\\) Interview \\& assessment suggestions (practical screening)

Stage 1 — CV \\+ portfolio review

● Look for evidence of the exact mix: EA \\+ social \\+ web.

Stage 2 — Phone screen (30 mins)

● Evaluate phone presence, cold\\-call comfort, language fluency, availability.

● Ask for 2 examples of conflict handled with a client and 2 process improvements they implemented.

Stage 3 — Practical test (take\\-home, 24–48 hrs)

● a) Draft 3 short email templates: initial outreach, viewing follow\\-up, nurture.

● b) Perform a 1\\-page SEO checklist / quick wins audit for the agents website (3–5 actions).

Kindly Share your CV @chathu.r@xrealty.ae / WA \\+971565467362

Only selected candidates will be contacted.

Job Type: Full\\-time

Pay: From AED6,000\\.00 per month

title: Regional Marketing Operations & Omnichannel Manager IMEA
description:
* 1591
* Dubai, United Arab Emirates
* Marketing
* IMEA
* Permanent
* Hybrid
**Job Description**
-------------------

**Overview** *Welcome diversity and apply as you are!*  

*At Adisseo, we cherish the value of diversity whatever it may be.*  

  

**By joining Adisseo**, you will join committed people who make the difference every day to contribute to this challenge.  

**By joining Adisseo**, you will integrate a dynamic international environment.  

**By joining Adisseo**, you will discover a world full of opportunities for every stage of your career by being actor to your professional journey. **Role Purpose**
The Regional Marketing Operations \\& Omnichannel Manager will oversee and coordinate the marketing support team across the MEA and ISC regions. This role ensures operational excellence in marketing processes, drives the effective use of omnichannel and digital marketing platforms, and measures ROI to optimize marketing impact. The position supervises the Marketing Events Specialist (MEA, Dubai) and the Marketing Admin (ISC, India), ensuring seamless integration of digital, physical, and partner\\-driven activities. The role will also ensure compliance with corporate guidelines, alignment with global campaigns, and effective collaboration with sales and global marketing stakeholders  

  

**Responsibilities** **Key Responsibilities****Omnichannel Strategy \\& Execution*** Design and execute omnichannel engagement strategies across digital, physical, and partner channels to create seamless customer journeys.
* Ensure global campaigns are adapted and locally activated by developing a standardized process to support the marketing managers.
* Oversee consistent content and messaging across channels (events, social, email, webinars, distributor platforms, etc.).
* Drive collaboration between marketing, sales, and distributors to deliver a unified customer experience.

**Digital Marketing Leadership*** Lead the deployment of digital tools and channels (email, social media, SEO, paid campaigns, virtual events, analytics platforms).
* Introduce and optimize marketing automation, CRM\\-marketing integration, and dashboards to improve efficiency and personalization.
* Explore innovative channels and tactics to strengthen visibility, engagement, and lead generation.

**ROI \\& Budget Accountability*** Track, analyse, and report the ROI of marketing activities, including digital campaigns, omnichannel activations, events, and sponsorships.
* Own and monitor the regional marketing budget, ensuring accurate allocation, forecasting, and reporting.
* Provide insights and recommendations to improve the cost\\-effectiveness of marketing investments.

**Marketing Operations Excellence*** Develop standardized processes, templates, and KPIs to ensure efficiency and alignment with global and regional objectives.
* Maintain accurate documentation of marketing activities, budgets, and ROI evaluations.
* Establish reporting routines for internal stakeholders to ensure transparency, governance, and accountability.
* Ensure compliance with corporate policies, brand standards, and legal/regulatory requirements.

**Team Management \\& Coordination*** Directly manage and coach the Marketing Events Specialist (MEA) and the Marketing Admin (ISC).
* Ensure effective coordination of event management, administrative support, and record\\-keeping across regions.
* Foster a culture of continuous improvement, collaboration, and knowledge sharing within the team.


  

**Qualifications**  

* Bachelor’s or master’s degree in marketing, Business Administration, or related field.
* 5\\+ years of experience in marketing, with at least 3 years in digital and omnichannel leadership.
* Track record in managing budgets, ROI analysis, and performance reporting.
* Excellent knowledge of digital marketing, CRM, marketing automation, and analytics platforms.
* Proven people management experience, preferably across multi\\-country or regional teams.
* Strong organizational and communication skills, with ability to coordinate across geographies and functions.
* Travel time will be limited to around 20%, mainly to the exhibitions, big events i.e. Adisseo Academy and Marketing Team meetings.
* Language: English is a must. Arabic is an important asset.

title: Admin Officer
description:
##### **Job Purpose**

dnata is one of the world’s largest air and travel services providers; offering ground handling, cargo, travel and catering \\& retail services at over 130 airports in more than 34 countries across six continents. At dnata, we are by your side for the entire travel experience.


As an **Admin Officer** you will lead and manage the administration and workforce governance functions within the Contact Centre by ensuring accurate maintenance, analysis, and reporting of employee data across global operations sites. The role is responsible for driving process compliance, and providing actionable insights through workforce analytics on attrition, attendance, and headcount trends. It also oversees the development and performance of the Admin Team, ensures alignment with organizational policies and ISO standards, and partners with cross\\-functional teams to support informed management decisions, cost control, and continuous process improvement.


**In this role you will:**

* Manage operational responsibilities such as leave planning, sickness, industrial injury, promotion, attendance exception reporting, performance exception reporting etc., capturing related data on a continuous basis, and developing the same into useable information. Work closely with internal and partner departments to ensure effective use of resources.
* Establish and prioritize department policies, processes and procedures into discrete tasks with clear accountabilities. Conduct periodic analysis on overtime, absence, sickness data and highlight trends to management with a view to curtail costs and address irregularities in support of good work practices.
* Maintain and analyse of attrition data for dnata Global Operations (approx. 2,000 employees) across multiple sites. This includes generating and maintaining dashboards on 12\\-month rolling attrition, month\\-on\\-month attrition trends, training fallouts, and voluntary vs. involuntary attrition counts, providing actionable insights to support workforce planning and decision\\-making.
* Represent the department in management decisions concerning employee administrative matters, as part of the working group on key projects/ work assignments related to Quality, Operations, IT Systems, etc as necessary and required and drive enhancements for the user department.
* Provide effective hands\\-on supervision and day to day management of an Admin Team. Responsible for their performance management, providing timely feedback and coaching when required.
* Coordinate and govern employee data by liaising with the Central BI team to capture, validate information. This includes performing quality checks to ensure accuracy and integrity.
Own ISO documents for the admin team with accountability for maintaining and updating SOPs, ensuring process governance, and representing the team during internal and external ISO audits.  
* 
##### **Qualification**

**To be considered for the role, you must meet the below requirements:**

* Experience in managing mid\\-sized customer focused teams (10 members or more)
* 12 Years schooling or equivalent
* 5\\+ Years of experience in Administration field
* Thorough understanding of the Emirates group policies, processes and practices
* Proven ability to coach and motivate staff
* Advanced Microsoft Office skills such as analysing information in excel, writing formulae and
automating routine tasks.  
* 
***Our services on the ground keep the world in the air. We’re one of the largest air services providers in the world, and you’ll find us in over 80 countries offering expertise in ground handling, cargo, travel and flight catering. We’re growing fast, and we’re looking for people with imagination and creativity to join our team of more than 40,000 people. We want potential stars to help us deliver on the promises our customers make.***

##### **Salary \\& benefits**

Join us in Dubai and enjoy an attractive tax\\-free salary and travel benefits that are exclusive to our industry, including discounts on flights and hotels stays around the world. Find out what it’s like to live and work in our fast\\-paced, cosmopolitan home city in the Dubai Lifestyle section of our website www.emirates.com/careers

title: MT5 Manager & Admin Operations
description:
Department: Dealing / Operations

Reports To:Operations Head / Regional Director

Job Summary:

The MT5 Manager \\& Admin Operations role oversees the technical and operational functions of the brokerage’s MT5 trading environment. The position ensures platform stability, trade execution efficiency, accurate client data management, and coordination between departments for smooth operational flow.

Key Responsibilities:

MT5 Management:

\\* Oversee daily MT5 server operations including user account setup, group configuration, and symbol management.

\\* Monitor trade activities, spreads, swaps, and execution performance.

\\* Implement risk parameters and manage A/B book routing as directed by management.

\\* Coordinate with liquidity providers and bridge teams to ensure seamless price feed and trade execution.

\\* Conduct regular backup and maintenance of MT5 servers and databases.

\\* Manage plugins, reports, and trade audit logs for compliance and performance tracking.

\\* Handle technical issues related to trading accounts and platform connectivity.

Admin \\& Operations:

\\* Maintain and update client data, KYC documents, and account statuses within CRM and back\\-office systems.

\\* Collaborate with finance teams for deposit/withdrawal reconciliation and transaction reporting.

\\* Prepare operational reports—daily deposits, withdrawals, active users, and volume summaries.

\\* Support the sales and IB departments by ensuring client trading accounts and commission structures are correctly configured.

\\* Liaise with compliance for trade audit checks and regulatory reporting.

\\* Track ongoing client activities to identify operational gaps or potential risks.

\\* Coordinate with tech support teams to address platform updates, CRM sync, and security measures.

Requirements:

\\* Bachelor’s degree in Finance, IT, or 2\\-3 years of experience in related field.

\\* Minimum 2–3 years’ experience in Forex operations, preferably handling MT5/MT4 systems.

\\* Strong knowledge of trading platforms, liquidity bridges, and risk management systems.

\\* Familiarity with CRM and back\\-office integration for brokers.

\\* Excellent analytical, communication, and multitasking skills.

\\* Ability to troubleshoot and handle platform\\-related technical issues efficiently.

Preferred Skills:

\\* Experience with MetaTrader 5 Administrator \\& Manager roles.

\\* Understanding of \\*PAMM/MAM systems\\* and IB structures.

\\* Advanced Excel reporting and CRM usage (e.g., UpTrader, Leverate, or similar is an advantage).

\\* Strong coordination with tech, compliance, and dealing departments.

**POSITION SUMMARY**


Our jobs aren’t just about giving guests a smooth check\\-in and check\\-out. Instead, we want to build and experience that is memorable and unique. Our Guest Experience Experts take the initiative to deliver a wide range of services that guide guests through their entire stay. They are empowered to move about their space and do what needs to be done. Whether processing operational needs, addressing guest requests, completing reports, or sharing the highlights of the local area, the Guest Experience Expert makes transactions feel like part of the experience.


No matter what position you are in, there are a few things that are critical to success – creating a safe work place, following company policies and procedures, maintaining confidentiality, protecting company assets, upholding quality standards, and ensuring your uniform, personal appearance, and communications are professional. Guest Experience Experts will be on their feet and moving around (stand, sit, or walk for an extended time) and taking a hands\\-on approach to work (move, lift, carry, push, pull, and place objects weighing less than or equal to 10 pounds without assistance). Doing all these things well (and other reasonable job duties as requested) is critical for Guest Experience Experts – to get it right for our guests and our business each and every time.


*At Marriott International, we are dedicated to being an equal opportunity employer, welcoming all and providing access to opportunity. We actively foster an environment where the unique backgrounds of our associates are valued and celebrated. Our greatest strength lies in the rich blend of culture, talent, and experiences of our associates. We are committed to non\\-discrimination on any protected basis, including disability, veteran status, or other basis protected by applicable law.*


Marriott Hotels strive to elevate the art of hospitality, innovating at every opportunity while keeping the comfort of the oh\\-so\\-familiar all around the globe. As a host with Marriott Hotels, you will help keep the promise of “Wonderful Hospitality. Always.” by delivering thoughtful, heartfelt, forward\\-thinking service that upholds and builds upon this living legacy. With the name that’s synonymous with hospitality the world over, we are proud to welcome you to explore a career with Marriott Hotels. In joining Marriott Hotels, you join a portfolio of brands with Marriott International. **Be** where you can do your best work, **begin** your purpose, **belong** to an amazing global team, and **become** the best version of you.  




JW Marriott is part of Marriott International's luxury portfolio and consists of more than 100 beautiful properties in gateway cities and distinctive resort locations around the world. JW believes our associates come first. Because if you’re happy, our guests will be happy. JW Marriott associates are confident, innovative, genuine, intuitive, and carry on the legacy of the brand’s namesake and company founder, J.Willard Marriott. Our hotels offer a work experience unlike any other, where you’ll be part of a community and enjoy true camaraderie with a diverse group of co\\-workers. JW creates opportunities for training, development, recognition and most importantly, a place where you can pursue your passions in a luxury environment with a focus on holistic well\\-being. Treating guests exceptionally starts with the way we take care of our associates. That’s The JW Treatment™. In joining JW Marriott, you join a portfolio of brands with Marriott International. **Be** where you can do your best work, **begin** your purpose, **belong** to an amazing global team, and **become** the best version of you.

Wood is an integral part of operations in Iraq, and we are continuing to grow our footprint across the country. title: Assistant Nurse
description:
**Main Responsibilities:**

**OPERATIONAL STANDARDS**

* **English speaker preferred**

* To promote the company’s values, mission, vision, and curriculum to visitors.
* To adhere to the guidance issued in the Company’s Operational Plan, Policies and Procedures, and Staff Handbook, and ensure this is implemented throughout the nursery (this may include duties relating to administration, early years practice, leadership of the team and personal behavior and responsibilities).
* Engage in ongoing assessment and evaluation of policies, procedures, and programs, and implement change to achieve maximum efficiency and effectiveness.
* To carry out duties with a customer focused attitude, providing excellent customer service with a proactive work ethic.
* To oversee responsibility for ensuring that all performance management systems that are in place are followed e.g., new staff induction, new staff probation and teacher supervision, team meetings in the absence of a Branch Manager.
* To ensure confidentiality of all information received and ensure that it is shared appropriately (This includes staff personal information and salary, student information etc.)
* To be in charge of maintaining Kinderpedia application.
* To be liable for the nursery standards and that Centre is operationally ready daily (The setting is a safe environment for children, staff and all others entering the building. That equipment is safe, standards of hygiene are high, and safety procedures are implemented and followed at all times.)
* To undertake all training that is deemed necessary for you in the role.
* To undertake any other reasonable duties as directed by any staff member in a position of seniority to you, whether usually based at your base setting or otherwise.
* To be overall responsible in maintaining the safety and wellbeing of children at all times. This includes ensuring children are only collected by authorized people listed for the individual. Ensuring that any medications are administered in line with company policy and the requirements and permissions of the parents.
* To carry out daily risk assessment checks to ensure all aspects of the room meet the requirements for set up. Informing the management of any issues or concerns that may become apparent.
* To ensure that members of staff maintain inventory of tangible and non\\-tangible resources in Nursery.

**PARENTS AND STUDENTS**

* To be responsible for admission in line with admission policy.
* To ensure that all key children report, and weekly messages are moderated.
* To ensure all administrative records are properly maintained by team and updated (daily registers, contact list, staff folders, registration forms, payments, accidents form etc.).
* To effectively manage parental complaints.
* To liaise closely with parents/ carers, informing them about current curriculum changes and practices that may impact on their child’s progress through conversations or on Kinderpedia.
* To input student data and create parent contract upon admissions.
* To exceed the care standards as monitored by the ministries.
* To promote ethos of inclusive practice.
* To ensure early identification and intervention is implemented.
* To liaise with parents and external agencies for the progress of the child.

**EDUCATION AND CURRICULUM**

* To be responsible for providing high quality education and learning, ensuring that appropriate experiences, stimulation, and support is available at all times, to the key stakeholders attending the setting.
* To ensure the teaching team maintains the highest standard of curriculum deliverance daily through observations and assessments.
* To liaise with Head of Operations and curriculum team for curriculum training and queries.
* To be overall in charge in planning events and celebration and delegate tasks accordingly.

**STAFF**

* To set highest possible standards with staff.
* To recruit, hire, train and evaluate staff and recommend developmental activities for the progress of the team.
* To supervise, lead and support members of staff.
* To complete termly assessments and observations of teachers and recommend necessary training or actions.
* To ensure that staff folders are up to date.

**FINANCE AND MARKETING**

* To be responsible for conducting school tours and send information.
* To liaise with the finance department in matters of budgets, fees and purchases.
* To ensure social media platforms are up to date in promoting individual branch.
* To work closely with Marketing team in achieving targets.
* To work closely with the Finance and Admin team to ensure outstanding fees are paid up.
* To be able to receive payments, create children’s contract and churn invoices when necessary.
* To ensure staff and parents comply with financial policies upon joining.
* To complete competitive market analysis.

**GOVERNMENT RELATIONS**

* To be responsible in managing government portals.
* To implement the recommendations of any regulatory inspection and maintain standards set for inspections by governing bodies\\- KHDA, DHA, Dubai Municipality etc.

**EXTERNAL VENDORS**

* To note that all extracurricular activities within nursery setting are organized.
* To liaise with external vendors as required and bearing the price in mind.
* To collate and track contacts and contract with external vendors.
* To liaise with maintenance contractor in matters of health and safety.
* To order and maintain equipment and resources in setting.

title: Accountant Trader
description:
**Arabic Speaking Mandatory**

**Organization:** Memas Commodities DMCC  
Established in 2014, Memas Commodities is committed to becoming a leading bullion trader and manufacturer of precious metals in the United Arab Emirates. Leveraging its strategic location at the crossroads of trade and commerce between the East and West, Memas Commodities benefits from progressive governance, liberal policies, and business\\-friendly regulations.

**Job Title:** Accountant / Trader (Trading Platform Admin Handler)  
**Location:** Dubai, UAE  
**Male candidates preferred**

**Company Overview**

We are a multinational group of companies specializing in Gold and Commodity Trading. With operations across various countries, we leverage advanced platforms like **MT5** and **Centroid Bridge** to manage and optimize our trading and financial operations.

**Job Summary**

We are seeking a technically skilled and detail\\-oriented **Trading Platform Admin Handler** to manage and maintain our trading infrastructure, primarily focused on **MetaTrader 5 (MT5\\)** or equivalent platforms. This role is central to ensuring seamless trading operations, system integrity, and client account management.

**Key Responsibilities**

**Platform Administration**

* Configure and maintain Trading / MT5 / MT4 servers, manager terminals, and access points.
* Set up trading instruments, groups, spreads, swaps, commissions, and leverage settings.
* Manage plugins, APIs, and integrations with CRM, payment gateways, and liquidity providers.

**Operational Oversight**

* Monitor server performance, uptime, and logs for anomalies or latency issues.
* Handle client account operations including creation, fund adjustments, and troubleshooting.
* Support risk management teams with exposure monitoring and margin alerts.

**Technical Support \\& Maintenance**

* Perform regular server backups, updates, and disaster recovery procedures.
* Troubleshoot platform\\-related issues and coordinate with application vendors or hosting partners.
* Ensure compliance with internal IT security protocols and regulatory standards.

**Reporting \\& Compliance**

* Generate daily, weekly, and monthly operational and management reports.
* Maintain accurate trade logs and assist in report preparation.

**Qualifications \\& Skills**

* **Education:** Bachelor’s degree in Accounts, IT, or a related field.
* **Experience:** 2–4 years in Trading / MT5 / MT4 administration or brokerage operations.
* **Industry Knowledge:** Forex, commodities, and trading infrastructure.
* **Language Skills:** **Fluent in English \\& Arabic (Arabic Speaking Mandatory).**

**Application**  
Please submit your updated CV along with a brief cover message or professional summary to: **hr@dijllah@gmail.com**

title: Admin/Project Manager, Marketing - FIVE Palm Jumeirah
description:
### **Job Description**


**An Exhilarating Opportunity**

  

Are You Ready for a Daring Challenge with The World’s Hottest Luxury Hotel Group? Disruptive by Design, FIVE Hotels and Resorts is Redefining ‘FIVE\\-Star’ Hospitality and Setting the Gold Standard across the Industry.

  

Join the FIVE Tribe \\- and Get Ready to Make Waves.

 **The Candidate**

  

A Driven Self\\-Starter, you have Excellent Communication, Leadership and Organisational Skills. As an Astute Creative and Critical Thinker, you can Conceptualise and Implement Innovative Solutions in a Fast\\-Paced Environment. Not even the Smallest Detail Escapes Your Keen Eye and You Execute Tasks Proactively with Precision and Finesse. A ‘Can\\-Do!’ Attitude Coupled with An Inherent Flair for Taking Ownership Makes You a Highly Motivated Go\\-Getter.

  

Your Outgoing and Approachable Nature enables you to Seamlessly Connect with other ‘FIVERs’ and key Stakeholders, ensuring that Their and Your Journey at FIVE is nothing short of Sensational. Joining our Engineering Team as an Elevator Engineer will Empower you to deliver Exceptional Experiences across our award\\-winning Lifestyle Destinations. Jump on Board and Unlock your Potential in a Buzzing Environment that will take your Career to New Heights!

 **What We’re Looking For**

  

* A minimum of 3 years’ Project Management experience, ideally within Hospitality, Events, or Lifestyle Industries.
* A Proactive Nature, coupled with a meticulous Eye for Detail, ensuring every aspect of the operation is Curated to Perfection.
* Excellent communication and interpersonal skills, leveraging strong verbal and written skills to engage effectively with Guests, FIVE Tribe Members, and Stakeholders.
* Next\\-Level Organisational and Multitasking skills, with the ability to Manage Multiple Priorities simultaneously.
* ‘FIVE\\-Styled’ Visionary thinking by finding creative solutions, while taking Ownership for all duties and tasks assigned.
* Sensational Teamwork and Collaboration skills to work effectively within a group and across departments with Fellow ‘FIVERs’
* Impeccable communication skills, both verbal and written, with fluency in English (additional languages are a plus).
* Good knowledge of Budgeting, Payroll, and Administration Processes is a plus.
* A hands\\-on attitude, fuelled by a ‘Can\\-Do!’ Spirit.

 **Key Responsibilities**

  

* Assists in ordering Marketing Collateral, ensuring the progress, timelines, and milestones are executed in a timely, ‘FIVE\\-Styled’ Fashion.
* Demonstrates Sensational Teamwork by acting as the central point of coordination between Management, Suppliers, Creative, and Operational teams.
* Meticulously ensures that all deliverables are aligned with FIVE’s Award\\-Winning brand standards.
* Manages the full project lifecycle with Remarkable Attention to Detail, ensuring timelines, budgets and quality standards are Consistently Achieved.
* Monitors workflows and escalates potential risks or delays in advance, demonstrating a Phenomenal Sense of Ownership.
* Oversees the Smooth Execution of Marketing and Brand events, ensuring Flawless Delivery and Exquisite Flair.
* Exquisitely Manages timely and accurate payroll in a manner that consistently Sets the Gold Standard.
* Expertly Supports the Finance Functions and/or liaises with the Finance Team.
* Provides First\\-in\\-Class Administrative Support including Travel Arrangements, Contract Management, and day\\-to\\-day Team Support.
* Builds Effective Relationships with internal and external Stakeholders, with ‘FIVE\\-Star’ Precision.
* Undertakes additional tasks and projects with a Bold and Energetic Spirit.

 **The Team**  

‘FIVERs’ are Cultured yet Chic, Confident yet Self\\-Effacing, and Work Hard to Play even Harder. As a FIVE Tribe Member, you'll Personify the distinct ‘Vibe at FIVE’ and apply it to create Insta\\-Perfect Experiences for our Guests that keeps them Coming Back for More. If you Dream of being surrounded by Like\\-Minded Individuals who share your Passion for Delivering Unforgettable Moments that last a Lifetime – then Look No Further and Unleash your Next\\-Level Potential.

 **Sustainable Indulgence at FIVE**

  

FIVE curates world\\-class Entertainment and Luxury Living while Championing Environmental Stewardship. Driven by its core millennial base, FIVE has aligned to lead the way in ‘Sustainable Indulgence’ trailblazing next\\-level, high\\-energy Experiences within an Environmentally and Socially Responsible Framework.

 **An Equal Opportunity Employer**

  

  



The FIVE Tribe represents over 80 nationalities across its over 2000 ‘FIVERs.’ FIVE does not discriminate and is Committed to Hiring a Diverse and Inclusive Workforce as an Equal\\-Opportunity Employer. Ranked regularly in the Top 10 on the Great Workplaces in the UAE list of Large Organisations, the FIVE Tribe is more than a group of people working together – it is a Family bonded by common Values and Goals, Celebrating People, Culture and Diversity.

  

  



**About FIVE Hotels and Resorts**

  

FIVE Hotels and Resorts prides itself on being Disruptively Different and Daringly Unique. Our Growing Portfolio of Lavish Destinations in the Middle East and Europe are the epitome of Glamour and Experiential Luxury, offering boundary\\-breaking Experiences at FIVE’s award\\-winning Hotels, Dining Concepts, and Immersive Nightlife Venues. As part of the Accomplished FIVE Tribe, you will be part of a group of High Achievers who Fearlessly Challenge Conventions on a Global Stage.

We are looking for a detail\\-oriented and proactive **Reception Cum Admin** to support both administration and human resources functions. This role requires excellent organizational skills, attention to detail, and the ability to manage multiple priorities while ensuring smooth day\\-to\\-day operations.

* Strong knowledge of MS Office and ERP systems.

**What We Offer**

* Opportunities for professional growth and development.
* A supportive and collaborative work environment.

title: Business Support Coordinator
description:
**Allow us to introduce ourselves.**


dss\\+ is a leading global operations transformation consultancy that helps our clients build business endurance through operational safety, risk, performance and sustainability by leveraging our industry expertise, our dss\\+360 digital platform, our recognised people solutions and IP. We work with clients across various industries, to deliver measurable and lasting improvements.


We are seeking an organised, proactive and experienced **Business Support Coordinator** to join the team where you will be involved with various office support and administrative functions. The role requires exemplary attention to detail and highly developed interpersonal skills. Proactive analysis and problem solving are a must, as is the ability to work in a team environment with a flexible and positive team spirit to achieve goals and objectives.


This is a permanent role that will be based in our Dubai office, and the candidate must be willing to work in the office 5 days a week (Monday to Friday).


***This role falls within the guidelines of the Emiratization Initiative.***

 **Does this sound like you?**

**Office Administration Activities**

* Support business operations e.g. team meeting content coordination and facilitation
* Oversees IT related activities for the wider team
* Ensures team members have all required resources
* Coordinates operational procedures e.g travel logistics for client engagements and leadership team travel
* Ensures business office is professional and in compliance with all polices, regulations, and laws
* Oversees office utilities including coordination of stationery and subsistence requirements etc.
* Team event coordination and organization as/where required
* Executive support and other ad\\-hoc administrative requirements for Leadership team

**Business Support \\& Coordination Activities**

* Support with day\\-to\\-day business operations and admin support activities
* Coordination of travel logistics, business meetings etc
* Admin support with submission of expense claims for Directors
* Assists in the preparation of the office budget
* Coordination of office events and meetings
* Maintains confidentiality in all areas

 **Who are you today?**

* Bachelor’s degree in Business Management, Accounting or related degree, or equivalent professional experience
* Proven experience in business admin support
* Technical fluency with Microsoft Office Suite
* Able to work effectively within a collaborative / team environment
* Strong attention to detail and ability to focus
* Demonstrable planning and organizational skills
* Goal and outcome\\-oriented skills
* Strong interpersonal, written, and verbal communication skills
* Professionalism and integrity
* Proven ability to adhere to confidentiality requirements
* Demonstratable analytical thinking and problem solving.
* UAE National and resident in the UAE

 **Let's see where our shared vision leads.**


We have a strong growth trajectory and a global footprint, which means unprecedented opportunity for the people on our teams to advance their careers.


As a Global Company, our professionals have the possibility to contribute to international projects and grow with the company. Every employee can influence and impact our company. At dss\\+, we embrace and celebrate diversity. Above all, we are an inclusive culture in which everyone contributes and has the chance to develop their talents further.

description:
**Gender:** Male

**Company Overview:**

TEKDEP is a US\\-based technology solutions company, now firmly established in Dubai. We deliver innovative device repair and IT services and are building a talented team to take our business to the next level. Join us to grow your career in a dynamic and forward\\-thinking environment.

**About the Role**

We are seeking for a creative and enthusiastic male Social Media \\& Content Executive to become the voice of our brand. In this role, you will create engaging content, manage our online communities, and help grow our presence organically across social media platforms.

The ideal candidate is passionate about storytelling, has strong skills in video editing and graphic design, and thrives on building meaningful connections with audiences. This is a perfect opportunity for a talented individual looking to make a tangible impact in a dynamic, creative environment.

**Key Responsibilities**

**Content Creation is Key: You will be the creator of our social media content. This includes:**

**Social Media Management:** Develop a content calendar, schedule posts, and manage our daily presence across key platforms (e.g., Instagram, LinkedIn, TikTok, Facebook).

**Graphic Design**: Designing creative and on\\-brand posts, stories, and infographics using tools like Photoshop, Adobe Suite, Capcut, etc..

**Video Editing:** Creating and editing engaging short and long\\-form videos for platforms like Instagram Reels, TikTok, and YouTube.

**Copywriting:** Writing compelling, clever, and error\\-free captions, and other short\\-form copy that reflects our brand's voice.

**Community Engagement:** Act as the bridge between our brand and our audience. This involves:

* Responding to comments and direct messages in a timely and personable manner.
* Proactively engaging with our followers' content and relevant accounts.
* Initiating conversations through polls, questions, and interactive stories to boost engagement.

**Organic Growth:** Brainstorm and implement creative strategies to grow our follower base and reach without relying on paid advertising.

**Monitoring \\& Reporting:** Keep an eye on social media trends and track basic analytics (like engagement rate, follower growth, and reach) to understand what content performs best.

**Skills and Qualifications**

**Required:**

* **A Passion for Social Media:** Deep understanding of platforms like Instagram, TikTok, and LinkedIn, with up\\-to\\-date knowledge of the latest trends.
* **Graphic Design:** Proven experience using photo editing tools is essential. Knowledge of Photoshop, Canva, Figma, or Illustrator is a plus.
* **Video Editing:** Skilled in editing with tools such as Adobe Premiere Pro, CapCut, or similar.
* **Writing:** Excellent command of English with the ability to craft creative, engaging copy.
* **Experience with Meta Business Suite:** Confident in managing and scheduling posts, analyzing insights.
* **A Great Eye for Detail:** Spotting everything from typos to off\\-center design elements.
* **Proactive \\& Collaborative:** A self\\-starter who contributes ideas, learns quickly, and thrives in teamwork.

**Nice to Have:**

* A portfolio showcasing your design, video, and social media work (personal, academic, or professional projects are all welcome!).
* Knowledge of Basic SEO principles.
* Experience managing a social media account for a brand, a university club, or a personal project.
* Photography skills.
* A Bachelor's degree in Marketing, Communications, or a related field.

Job Types: Full\\-time, Fresher

Pay: AED3,000\\.00 \\- AED6,000\\.00 per month

title: Hotel Driver
company: Holiday Inn Express Dubai Internet City
description:
Our Hotel is currently looking for a Hotel Driver who will be responsible for providing safe, efficient, and courteous transportation services for hotel guests. This role is a vital part of the guest experience, requiring a high degree of professionalism, punctuality, and excellent customer service. The driver serves as a key representative of the hotel's brand, ensuring guests are transported comfortably and receive a welcoming, friendly, and informative service.

**Key Duties and Responsibilities:**

***Guest Transportation***

* Safely and punctually transport guests to and from designated locations, such as airports, malls, and beach , using the hotel's vehicle.
* Adhere to all traffic laws, safety regulations, and hotel policies while operating vehicles.
* Plan and follow the most efficient routes, considering traffic and weather conditions, and use GPS and navigation systems effectively.

***Customer Service \\& Guest Relations***

* Greet all guests warmly upon arrival and departure, assisting with opening and closing vehicle doors.
* Provide assistance with guest luggage, including loading, unloading, and securing it properly.
* Offer local knowledge and recommendations about the city, attractions, and hotel services in a friendly and informative manner.
* Maintain a high level of discretion and professionalism, especially when transporting VIP or high\\-profile guests.
* Address guest inquiries, requests, and concerns promptly and courteously.

***Vehicle Maintenance \\& Safety***

* Conduct daily pre\\- and post\\-trip vehicle inspections, checking for cleanliness, damage, tire pressure, and fluid levels.
* Ensure the vehicle's interior and exterior are meticulously clean and well\\-maintained at all times.
* Report any mechanical issues, accidents, or incidents to the supervisor immediately.
* Ensure the vehicle is fueled and ready for use at all times.
* Maintain accurate trip logs, including mileage, passenger count, and fuel consumption.

***Hotel and Team Collaboration***

* Communicate effectively with the Front Office team to coordinate pick\\-up and drop\\-off schedules and to be aware of guest needs.
* Maintain a professional appearance and wear the designated uniform at all times.
* Assist with other reasonable duties as requested by management, which may include light administrative tasks or other guest\\-facing support.

**Qualifications and Requirements:**

**Experience**

* Proven experience as a professional driver, preferably in a hotel or hospitality environment.
* A clean driving record with a valid \\[Country/State]\\-issued driver's license for the type of vehicle being operated (e.g., standard, commercial, etc.).

**Skills**

* Exceptional customer service and communication skills.
* Strong knowledge of local geography, traffic patterns, and alternate routes.
* Excellent time management and organizational skills.
* Ability to remain calm and professional under pressure.
* Physical ability to lift and carry luggage up to \\[e.g., 50 pounds] and assist guests as needed.

**Personal Attributes**

* A friendly, polite, and well\\-presented demeanor.
* Reliable, punctual, and adaptable to a flexible schedule, including weekends and holidays.
* A strong commitment to guest safety and satisfaction.
* Ability to work both independently and as part of a team.

Job Types: Full\\-time, Permanent, Fresher

Pay: AED1,600\\.00 \\- AED1,800\\.00 per month

Experience:

* Hotel Driver: 1 year (Required)

License/Certification:

* UAE driving license (Required)

description:
**Real Estate Consultant (Freshers Welcome) – Leasing \\& Sales \\| Dubai**

**Location:** Westburry Commercial Tower, Business Bay, Dubai, UAE  
**Start Immediately** \\| Full Training Provided

A Better Start in Real Estate

We know how hard it is to break into real estate in Dubai. Most agencies will leave you to figure it out on your own. We won’t. We believe **fresh talent needs real support, honest guidance, and access to real tools**.

We’re hiring new agents who are **committed, coachable, and ready to grow**. If you're serious about building a career in Dubai real estate and want to be surrounded by experienced mentors and an actual system that works — we’d love to hear from you.

**What You Can Expect as a New Agent:** 

**Training \\& Growth**

* Full practical training in leasing and sales
* One\\-on\\-one mentorship with top\\-performing agents
* Ongoing coaching on closing deals, working leads, and building a pipeline
* Opportunity to grow into a team leader with full training and guidance

**Day\\-to\\-Day Support**

* Property portal access with **featured and premium credits provided**
* Use of our **call center team** to help follow up on your leads
* Shared office space with a dedicated support team
* UAE sim card with **unlimited minutes and data**
* Monthly car parking allowance for top performers

**Long\\-Term Benefits**

* Visa and medical insurance
* Competitive commission structure with **performance\\-based increases upto 65%**
* Monthly bonus eligibility for consistent performers
* Clear path to promotion: Grow into a team leader and build your own team in 6\\-months

**Who We’re Looking For:**

You don’t need real estate experience – but we’re looking for **those who are serious about succeeding**.

* ✅ Based in Dubai or ready to relocate
* ✅ Committed to a full\\-time real estate career
* ✅ Excellent communication and people skills
* ✅ Driven, reliable, and open to learning
* ✅ Driving license and a car are preferred

A Humble, Focused Team

We’re a **quietly ambitious company** – focused on real work, real results, and helping our agents grow without ego or pressure. You won’t find false promises here. Just real people, working hard, supporting each other, and building something that lasts.

If you’re ready to take your first real step into Dubai real estate – we’re ready to invest in you.

Apply now to start your career with a team that wants to see you succeed.

title: Social Media Manager
description:
**Gender:** Male

**Company Overview:**

TEKDEP is a US\\-based technology solutions company, now firmly established in Dubai. We deliver innovative device repair and IT services and are building a talented team to take our business to the next level. Join us to grow your career in a dynamic and forward\\-thinking environment.

**About the Role**

We are seeking a creative and enthusiastic Social Media \\& Content Executive to become the voice of our brand. In this role, you will create engaging content, manage our online communities, and help grow our presence organically across social media platforms.

The ideal candidate is passionate about storytelling, has strong skills in video editing and graphic design, and thrives on building meaningful connections with audiences. This is a perfect opportunity for a talented individual looking to make a tangible impact in a dynamic, creative environment.

**Key Responsibilities**

**Content Creation is Key: You will be the creator of our social media content. This includes:**

**Social Media Management:** Develop a content calendar, schedule posts, and manage our daily presence across key platforms (e.g., Instagram, LinkedIn, TikTok, Facebook).

**Graphic Design**: Designing creative and on\\-brand posts, stories, and infographics using tools like Photoshop, Adobe Suite, Capcut, etc..

**Video Editing:** Creating and editing engaging short and long\\-form videos for platforms like Instagram Reels, TikTok, and YouTube.

**Copywriting:** Writing compelling, clever, and error\\-free captions, and other short\\-form copy that reflects our brand's voice.

**Community Engagement:** Act as the bridge between our brand and our audience. This involves:

* Responding to comments and direct messages in a timely and personable manner.
* Proactively engaging with our followers' content and relevant accounts.
* Initiating conversations through polls, questions, and interactive stories to boost engagement.

**Organic Growth:** Brainstorm and implement creative strategies to grow our follower base and reach without relying on paid advertising.

**Monitoring \\& Reporting:** Keep an eye on social media trends and track basic analytics (like engagement rate, follower growth, and reach) to understand what content performs best.

**Skills and Qualifications**

**Required:**

* **A Passion for Social Media:** Deep understanding of platforms like Instagram, TikTok, and LinkedIn, with up\\-to\\-date knowledge of the latest trends.
* **Graphic Design:** Proven experience using photo editing tools is essential. Knowledge of Photoshop, Canva, Figma, or Illustrator is a plus.
* **Video Editing:** Skilled in editing with tools such as Adobe Premiere Pro, CapCut, or similar.
* **Writing:** Excellent command of English with the ability to craft creative, engaging copy.
* **Experience with Meta Business Suite:** Confident in managing and scheduling posts, analyzing insights.
* **A Great Eye for Detail:** Spotting everything from typos to off\\-center design elements.
* **Proactive \\& Collaborative:** A self\\-starter who contributes ideas, learns quickly, and thrives in teamwork.

**Nice to Have:**

* A portfolio showcasing your design, video, and social media work (personal, academic, or professional projects are all welcome!).
* Knowledge of Basic SEO principles.
* Experience managing a social media account for a brand, a university club, or a personal project.
* Photography skills.
* A Bachelor's degree in Marketing, Communications, or a related field.

This is a crucial office\\-based role focused on driving business growth by identifying and engaging potential clients within the education sector (schools, colleges, universities) and corporate offices across the UAE.

If you are a master of communication with a talent for building relationships and a passion for technology, this is the perfect opportunity to build a successful career with us.

This involves researching target institutions, identifying key decision\\-makers (e.g., IT Managers, Principals, Office Managers), and building a robust sales pipeline.

**Direct Outreach:** Conduct high\\-volume outbound prospecting from the office via phone calls, personalized emails, and professional networking platforms like LinkedIn to introduce our products and services.

title: dSMS Administrator
description:
##### **Job Purpose**

dnata Airport Operations’ vast ground handling operations successfully service the major global hub that is Dubai International Airport. We deliver a seamless experience from check\\-in to baggage delivery for more than 80 million passenger and 140 scheduled airlines annually.


As a **dSMS Administrator** you will **,** provide executive administrative support to the Incident and Risk Manager and others as delegated. You will provide the technical and administrative support to department disciplines within dnata Safety including promotion and training activities, research and sourcing/collation of information and data to assist with administrative support in line with the dnata Safety Management System (dSMS).


**In this role, you will:**

* Review data that has been recorded to ensure that the information is accurate and as per the required format. Perform Assurance check on the data to ensure that the data that is recorded is an accurate representation of the incident occurrence.
* Prepare adhoc safety performance and trend analysis reports as and when required by Incident and Risk Manager, and other business stakeholders.
* Troubleshoot issues with the dSMS database system.
* Assist in team administrative tasks.
##### **Qualification**

**To be considered for the role, you must meet the below requirements:**

* Degree of Honours (12\\+3 or equivalent) and 4\\-6 years of experience in an administrative role preferably in a safety related function.
* Proficient numerical skills
* Basic data collection and analysis skills
* Basic writing and reporting skills
* Basic knowledge in Business Excellence model environments
* Proficient Communication Skills
* Advanced Writing Skills
* Proficient Customer Management Skills
* Proficient Planning and Organizing Skills
* Proficient Data Collection and Analysis Skills
* Proficient IT and Computer Literacy
Our services on the ground keep the world in the air. We’re one of the largest air services providers in the world, and you’ll find us in over 80 countries offering expertise in ground handling, cargo, travel and flight catering. We’re growing fast, and we’re looking for people with imagination and creativity to join our team of more than 40,000 people. We want potential stars to help us deliver on the promises our customers make.


##### **Salary \\& benefits**

Join us in Dubai and enjoy an attractive tax\\-free salary and travel benefits that are exclusive to our industry, including discounts on flights and hotels stays around the world. Find out what it’s like to live and work in our fast\\-paced, cosmopolitan home city in the Dubai Lifestyle section of our website www.emirates.com/careers
