description:
Administrator, Human Resources  

(17689\\)  


At Atlantis, we exist to bring the extraordinary to every holiday and experience through connection, empowerment, precision, care and warmth. Inspired by the majesty and mystery of the ocean, Atlantis resorts are unique destinations full of life, wonder and surprise, where we seek to exceed our guests’ expectations at every possible turn.  

  

Nestled between the calm turquoise waters of the Arabian Gulf and the majestic Dubai skyline, Atlantis, The Palm is the crown of the world\\-famous Palm island in Dubai. With a sense of exhilaration and discovery, we create unforgettable memories by providing guests the opportunity to discover an extraordinary world filled with thrilling adventures. Whether we are designing a couple’s retreat or serving the extraordinary in one of our award\\-winning celebrity chef restaurants, we approach everything with imagination to spark a sense of courage, inspiration and innovation. This is not simply our job, it’s our passion.  


**About the role**

In this pivotal role, you’ll ensure smooth and efficient HR administrative support for all internal colleagues, delivering accurate and timely solutions that reflect our commitment to outstanding service. You’ll manage key HR functions including SAP system updates, personal file maintenance, onboarding/offboarding processes, payroll support, and HR reception duties. Your proactive approach to issue resolution, attention to detail, and dedication to continuous improvement will help drive operational efficiency and enhance employee satisfaction across the organization. If you're passionate about delivering exceptional service, thrive in a fast\\-paced environment, and are ready to make a meaningful impact, we’d love to hear from you.  


**About You**

We’re seeking candidates who present a polished, professional image and demonstrate strong proficiency in Microsoft Office tools. The ideal candidate will have advanced administrative capabilities and fluency in a second language is a plus. A bachelor’s degree is required, along with 2–3 years of experience in both administrative roles and customer\\-focused industries such as hospitality. Strong organizational, communication, and writing skills are essential for managing complex tasks and delivering exceptional service.  


Atlantis Dubai is an iconic entertainment destination comprised of two world\\-class resorts; Atlantis, The Palm and Atlantis, The Royal; offering an unbeatable opportunity for you to grow and develop in your career. Join a team that is adventurous, creative, warm\\-hearted and extroverted. We believe in making our guests happy beyond anything they have ever imagined. We wow them at every turn and create memories that will last a lifetime. You will be at the heart of this vision, to constantly innovate to deliver Amazing Experiences and Everlasting Memories.

title: Administrator (Real Estate)
description:
Job Summary

We are seeking a dedicated, organized, and detail\\-oriented Administrator to join our Real Estate team. The successful candidate will handle administrative and property management tasks, maintain accurate records, support management, and ensure smooth daily operations across the department.

Key Responsibilities

1\\. Administrative \\& Office Support

* Prepare, review, and manage Service Agreements, tenancy contracts, renewals, and other company documents.
* Handle general office administrative duties, correspondence, and filing systems (both digital and physical).
* Maintain and update staff files, including visas, contracts, and leave applications.
* Support management with day\\-to\\-day operational and documentation tasks.
* Coordinate with internal departments and ensure proper document flow and record keeping.

2\\. Property \\& Tenancy Management

* Maintain accurate tenancy records, including data entry of contracts, renewals, payments, and tenant details.
* Update the property management system with collections, renewals, and tenant information.
* Issue renewal and payment reminders to tenants and report follow\\-up status to management.
* Prepare monthly tenancy, collection, and occupancy reports.
* Liaise with tenants for contract renewals, payments, and inquiries.

3\\. Coordination \\& External Liaison

* Manage and follow up with service providers to ensure agreement fulfillment and smooth implementation.
* Handle government\\-related online services such as Ejari, DEWA, Dubai Municipality, and other portals.
* Coordinate with the PRO and other departments for documentation and regulatory compliance.

4\\. Compliance \\& Monitoring

* Monitor property insurance, service charges, and supplier contracts to ensure timely renewal and compliance.
* Maintain accurate records of all property and supplier documentation.
* Assist in preparing letters and official correspondences in English for management and clients.
* Track and report key performance indicators (KPIs) related to administrative performance, documentation accuracy, and task completion.

Requirements

* Bachelor’s degree or diploma in Business Administration or a related field.
* Minimum 2 years of experience in administration or real estate office work within the UAE.
* Proficiency in Microsoft Office (Word, Excel, Outlook).
* Strong communication, coordination, and organizational skills.
* Familiarity with Ejari, DEWA, and government portals preferred.
* High level of confidentiality, accuracy, and attention to detail.
* Ability to multi\\-task, prioritize, and work independently under minimal supervision.

Skills \\& Competencies

* Excellent verbal and written communication in English (Arabic is an advantage).
* Strong time management and problem\\-solving skills.
* Proactive approach with the ability to take initiative.
* Professional demeanor and team\\-oriented attitude.

Job Type: Full\\-time

Pay: AED2,000\\.00 \\- AED2,500\\.00 per month

Application Question(s):

* Can you join immediately?

Experience:

* Administrator in Real Estate: 2 years (Required)

Listed On: 3 October 2025

Dubai
Innoventures Education is seeking seeking highly organised, personable, and proactive individuals who can subscribe to their vision, mission, and values to join the team for this role.

Innoventures Education is opening a new school in Dubai for the academic year starting August 2026 – Raffles World Academy – Aljada, Sharjah (IB with US High School Diploma). This is a key position at the heart of our school. You will be the first point of contact for parents, visitors, and prospective families – a true ambassador for our school community.



Key responsibilities


* Manage all aspects of the student admissions process, from enquiry to enrolment
* Respond promptly to phone, digital, and in\\-person enquiries with professionalism and warmth

* Excellent communication and interpersonal skills with a ‘can do’ attitude

We are proud to offer


* A dynamic work environment with outstanding facilities.
* Diverse team with focus on high performance.

* A competitive compensation package.

About Innoventures Education



Innoventures Education is committed to providing world\\-class education to the UAE. It manages the following schools and Early Childhood Centres (ECC) currently:  

* Collegiate International School
* Dubai International Academy in Emirates Hills and Al Barsha
* Raffles International School
* Raffles World Academy, and
* Raffles Early Childhood Centre (ECC)


It is launching two new schools for the academic year starting August 2026\\.  

* Dubai International Academy – Town Square, Dubai (IB)
* Raffles World Academy – Aljada, Sharjah (IB with US High School Diploma)


Our schools and ECCs are renowned for their high\\-quality curricula, inspiring learning environments and commitment to high\\-quality student outcomes. Together we have a total enrolment of over 9500 students from over 120 countries, with a dedicated and inspirational team of educators and administrators from virtually every corner of the globe.



How to Apply

title: Level 2 - Desktop Support Engineer
description:
**Location:** Dubai  
**Department:** IT Support \\& Operations  
**Reports To:** IT Manager

**Role Overview**

We are seeking a skilled **Level 2 IT Support Engineer** to join our growing IT operations team. The ideal candidate will have strong experience in IT support environments, with hands\\-on expertise in Microsoft Azure and modern cloud technologies. This role requires a proactive professional with strong troubleshooting skills, the ability to work independently, and a customer\\-focused mindset. Applicants with a valid UAE driving license and access to a personal vehicle will be preferred.

**Key Responsibilities**

* Provide **Level 2 technical support** to resolve escalated issues from Level 1 support.
* Diagnose, troubleshoot, and resolve hardware, software, and network\\-related incidents.
* Support and maintain **Microsoft Azure services** (VMs, AD, Intune, O365, Exchange Online, Security \\& Compliance).
* Manage **endpoint devices** (Windows, macOS, iOS, Android) including configuration, patching, and security compliance.
* Administer Active Directory, Group Policies, and user access management.
* Collaborate with Level 3 / infrastructure teams on escalated issues and project rollouts.
* Implement and maintain **cybersecurity best practices** (MFA, endpoint security, vulnerability management).
* Provide **remote and onsite support** to end\\-users across offices and client sites.
* Document solutions, update knowledge base, and follow ITIL\\-based service desk practices.
* Assist with IT infrastructure projects including **cloud migrations, hybrid setups, and automation initiatives**.
* Monitor system performance and proactively address potential issues.

**Job Requirements**

* Minimum **3–5 years’ experience** in IT Support (Level 2 or similar role).
* Hands\\-on experience with:
* **Microsoft Azure (VMs, AAD, Intune, Security \\& Compliance)**
* **Microsoft 365 suite (Exchange Online, Teams, SharePoint, OneDrive)**
* **Windows Server administration** (AD, DNS, DHCP, GPOs)
* **Networking fundamentals** (LAN, WAN, VPN, Firewalls, Switching, Wi\\-Fi)
* **Endpoint management** (Intune, SCCM, or equivalent)
* Strong troubleshooting and problem\\-solving skills.
* Knowledge of **current IT trends** such as:
* Cloud\\-first infrastructure
* Zero Trust security models
* AI\\-powered IT support tools
* Automation \\& scripting (PowerShell preferred)
* ITIL certification (Foundation or higher) is preferred.
* Industry certifications such as **Microsoft Certified: Azure Administrator Associate, CompTIA Network\\+/Security\\+, CCNA** are a plus.
* Excellent communication skills, with the ability to explain technical issues to non\\-technical users.
* Valid **driving license and access to a personal car** (preferred).

**What We Offer**

* Competitive salary and benefits package.
* Opportunities for professional growth and certification sponsorship.
* Exposure to cutting\\-edge cloud and IT security technologies.
* A collaborative and innovative work environment.

Job Type: Full\\-time

License/Certification:

* Do You Have Driving License \\& Car? (Preferred)

title: Document Controller
description:
**Job Title:** Document Controller – Construction

**Location:** Dubai, UAE

**About Us:**  
We are a leading construction company dedicated to delivering excellence in every project. We are currently seeking a detail\\-oriented and highly organized **Document Controller / Project Administrator** to support our management team and ensure efficient document control, administration, and coordination with clients, contractors, and consultants.

**Key Responsibilities:**

* Provide administrative and project support to the Project Director, Project Managers, Engineers, and Team Leaders.
* Manage document control processes, including logging, registering, archiving, and tracking all project documentation.
* Prepare and forward business correspondence to clients, contractors, subcontractors, and vendors.
* Prepare document transmittals, cover sheets, and compile specification documents as required.
* Handle RFIs, material submittals, drawings, and correspondence in a structured project database system.
* Ensure all records are properly dated, signed, distributed, and filed according to company procedures.
* Maintain a user\\-friendly filing system (hard \\& soft copies) for efficient document retrieval and tracking.
* Support the project team in daily administrative tasks, including office operations and stationery supplies.
* Control, track, and issue all project documentation including RFIs, IRs, NCRs, site instructions, change orders, shop drawings, submittals, payment certificates, and variations.
* Maintain updated registers/logs of all documentation, including revisions, submissions, and delays.
* Coordinate with the Accounts Department for billing updates and payment\\-related documentation.
* Organize and participate in meetings, prepare agendas, and take minutes of meeting.
* Prepare and update weekly and monthly project status reports for management and clients.
* Liaise with banks, Dubai Authorities, and Government Agencies for project\\-related submissions.
* Provide administrative and communication support to ensure smooth project execution.

**Qualifications \\& Skills:**

* Bachelor’s Degree or Diploma in Business Administration, Engineering, or a related field.
* Proven experience as a **Document Controller / Project Administrator** in the construction industry (UAE experience preferred).
* Strong knowledge of document control processes, project documentation, and correspondence handling.
* Excellent organizational and multitasking skills with attention to detail.
* Proficiency in MS Office (Word, Excel, PowerPoint) and document control/project management systems.
* Strong communication and interpersonal skills for coordination with clients, consultants, and contractors.
* Ability to work under pressure and meet deadlines.

**What We Offer:**

* Competitive salary package.
* Professional career development and training opportunities.
* Supportive and collaborative work environment.

Job Type: Full\\-time

Experience:

* Construction: 3 years (Required)

title: Zoho CRM Operator
description:
**The Opportunity**

We are seeking a detail\\-oriented and experienced **Zoho CRM Operator** to manage, maintain, and optimize our Zoho CRM platform. This role is crucial for ensuring data integrity, supporting our sales and marketing teams, and driving the effective use of the CRM across the organization. If you are a problem\\-solver who thrives on making systems efficient, we want to hear from you.

**Key Responsibilities**

The Zoho CRM Operator will be responsible for a variety of tasks, including but not limited to:

* **Data Management:** Performing regular data imports, exports, and deduping to maintain a clean, accurate, and up\\-to\\-date database.
* **System Maintenance:** Daily monitoring of the CRM system's health, troubleshooting issues, and managing user roles, profiles, and security settings.
* **Email Templates:** Providing design for the emails inside the App, and linking it to others, creating workflows to run it based on the events inside CRM records..
* **Configuration \\& Customization:** Creating and modifying custom modules, fields, layouts, workflows, blueprint automations, and validation rules to meet business needs.
* **Reporting \\& Analytics:** Developing and maintaining key reports, dashboards, and views to provide actionable insights for sales, marketing, and leadership.

**Required Skills \\& Qualifications:**

* **Proven experience (2 years)** as a Zoho CRM Administrator, Operator, or similar role.
* Deep understanding of the entire Zoho CRM suite's functionality, including Leads, Accounts, Contacts, Deals, and customization features.
* Demonstrable ability to manage large datasets and maintain high standards of data quality and governance.
* Proficiency in creating complex workflow rules and Blueprint automations.
* Strong analytical and problem\\-solving skills with meticulous attention to detail.
* Excellent written and verbal communication skills, with the ability to explain technical concepts to non\\-technical users.
* A self\\-starter attitude, capable of managing multiple priorities in a fast\\-paced environment.

**Preferred Skills (Nice\\-to\\-Haves):**

* Familiarity with other Zoho One applications (e.g., Zoho Analytics, Creator, Desk).

title: Facility Management Administrator
description:
**Purpose:**

The FM Administrator will process and coordinate activities pertaining to employee training, resignations and leaves in addition to coordinate purchase orders, archiving and other specific transactions in a timely and efficient manner to ensure adherence to internal procedures and the provision of high\\-quality service of the team.

**Job Responsibilities/Accountabilities:**

**Operations Support**

* Perform the day\\-to\\-day administration support needed by the department and maintain updated computerised records of activities to help in ensuring high productivity and a smooth flow of activities.
* Assist the team in any work needed such as drafting agreements, researching for suppliers, analysing supplier evaluation results, updating records and maintenance plans, coordinating meetings with tenants and customers, etc. to ensure that the necessary support and coordination is being provided to the team.
* Coordinate with the Purchasing department to receive Quotations provided by suppliers, prepare Purchase Orders and Vendor Contracts, and forward same for necessary approval.
* Follow up with the team on the status of reviewing and signing Purchase Orders, make any necessary amendments as advised, forward same to suppliers, and follow up with suppliers on delivery to ensure the provision of products/ services on time.
* Receive invoices from suppliers, vendors and proactively seek approval of the concern person on same as per the set standards and policies, post the invoice on the Navision system, and send the invoice – along with all relevant documents – to the Finance department with the proposal transmittal for processing.
* Maintain records of all Purchase Orders sent and invoicing transactions and update the log regularly to ensure that all data/ information pertaining to purchases is accurate and up to date.

**Staff Record Management**

* Process leaves applications by receiving same from employees, acquiring the required sign offs and approvals on them, and sending applications to the HR department in order to coordinate the employees’ leaves and receive the HR department’s approval on them.
* Follow up with the concern person on the completion of the Annual Leave Planer, maintain record of same, and ensure the aliment of the Planer’s data with the leave applications to ensure that minimal deviations to planned leaves/ holidays take place so as not to interrupt the flow of operations.
* Consolidate information related to employees’ overtime and liaise with line manager and HR Department to obtain necessary approvals.

**Administration**

* Initiate resourcing requests (against resignations) by drafting the requests according to set policies, communicate the requests to the HR department for processing, and follow up with the HR department on the progress of sourcing new employees to fill identified manpower gaps.
* Handle all archiving, filing, and record keeping of all documents pertaining to employee training, Standard Operating Procedures (SOPs), contracts and agreements, supplier quotations, purchase orders, etc. to ensure easy future reference to them.
* Attend meetings as necessary and prepare Minutes of Meetings accordingly while ensuring a proper reflection of meeting points and decisions and circulate the Minutes of Meetings to the concerned parties upon the approval of concern person.
* Coordinate with other departments all efforts needed to ensure that medical, visa renewals, training, etc. are being conducted on time to support employees and maintain a smooth follow of operations.

**Policies, Systems, Processes, \\& Procedures**

* Follow all relevant departmental policies, processes, standard operating procedures, and instructions so that work is carried out in a controlled and consistent manner.

**Statements \\& Reports**

* Assist in the preparation of timely and accurate departmental statements and reports to meet department requirements, policies, and standards.

**Quality, Health, Safety, \\& Environment** 

* Ensure all relevant quality, health, safety, and environmental procedures, instructions, and controls are adhered to, so that the safety of employees, quality of products/ services, and environmental compliance can be guaranteed.

**Minimum Requirements:**

**Education:** 

* Diploma in Business Administration or any related field

**Technical Qualification:**

* Coordination skills, time management skills, organization, numerical and problem\\-solving skills, communication, and interpersonal skills, typing skills, computer proficiency, and multiple stakeholder management skills.
* Minimum 3 years in coordinating operations and facilities management related tasks and activities; exposure to technical items, and facilities management with knowledge of basic HR and procurement functions is preferable.

Job Types: Full\\-time, Permanent

Ability to commute/relocate:

Application Question(s):

This role has been designed as ‘Hybrid’ with an expectation that you will work on average 2 days per week from an HPE office.**Who We Are:**


Hewlett Packard Enterprise is the global edge\\-to\\-cloud company advancing the way people live and work. We help companies connect, protect, analyze, and act on their data and applications wherever they live, from edge to cloud, so they can turn insights into outcomes at the speed required to thrive in today’s complex world. Our culture thrives on finding new and better ways to accelerate what’s next. We know varied backgrounds are valued and succeed here. We have the flexibility to manage our work and personal needs. We make bold moves, together, and are a force for good. If you are looking to stretch and grow your career our culture will embrace you. Open up opportunities with HPE.

**Job Description:**

  

AI is a high\\-growth market for HPE, and we believe we are uniquely suited to bring our end\\-to\\-end technologies spanning compute technologies from Edge to Cloud, purpose\\-built AI software, interconnect, and services, to support our customers’ AI journey. This is an incredibly exciting time to join a dynamic and rapidly growing team where you can play a key role in understanding the needs of our customers and enabling them to deliver their mission critical AI initiatives.

**In a typical day as an Solution Architect in AI \\& HPC...**

* **Solution Design and Architecture:** Collaborate with sales teams to understand customer requirements and develop tailored solutions for their AI infrastructure needs. Leverage your expertise in cloud architectures and AI technologies to design scalable, high\\-performance, and cost\\-effective solutions that meet customer objectives.
* **Pre\\-Sales Support:** Engage in pre\\-sales activities, including technical presentations, demonstrations, and proof\\-of\\-concepts, to showcase the capabilities and benefits of our AI\\-at\\-Scale solutions. Act as a trusted advisor to customers, addressing their questions, concerns, and technical challenges effectively.
* **Product Expertise:** Stay up\\-to\\-date with the latest advancements in AI technologies, cloud architectures, and infrastructure trends. Continuously build and maintain deep knowledge of our product portfolio, enabling you to articulate the value proposition and differentiators of our offerings to customers.
* Lead Proof\\-of\\-Concepts (PoC) for HPE customers expanding into Deep Learning or Machine Learning use cases.
* Architect reusable end\\-to\\-end AI solutions for HPE customers and prospects
* Lead technical discussions with customers and partners to propose HPE and partner Integrated solutions to address business challenges and opportunities through the use of AI.
* Identify solutions, define action plans, and help coordinate and deliver optimal solutions and enhancements. Recommend configurations and settings for different types of hardware and interconnect fabrics to be used by HPE customers along with AI and HPC Solution Architects and Pre Sales Engineers.
* Assist in any product or technical issue towards an initial sale or renewal of a customer.
* Maintains excellent communication with customer, with key focus on IT managers, administrators, and specialists.
* Work in collaboration with other Solution Engineers / Solution Architects to integrate the full solution pipeline.
* Assesses the impact of new technologies on the company’s technical solution portfolio and translates this understanding into practice and knowledge sharing activities for broader presales peers, account managers and partners.
* Actively monitors competitive activities and their client advocates within accounts to anticipate and plans for competitive threats. Increases the company share of wallet through competitive takeout, demonstrating technical superiority, and leveraging other company services for better TCO/ROI

**Education, Skills \\& Experience required...**

* Bachelor's or Master's degree in Engineering, Computer Science, or similar quantitative focus preferred
* Ability to quickly prototype functionality into scripts for demos, integrations, troubleshooting, etc.
* Expertise in cloud architectures, specifically with public cloud platforms such as AWS, Azure, or Google Cloud. Certification in cloud services is highly desirable.
* Strong understanding of AI technologies, including machine learning, deep learning, and neural networks. Familiarity with popular AI frameworks and libraries is a plus.
* Experience participating in solution configurations and the creation of PoCs to meet customer requirements.
* Solid knowledge of infrastructure components, including servers, storage, networking, and virtualization. Experience with high\\-performance computing (HPC) and GPU\\-accelerated systems is advantageous.
* Demonstrates expert technical skills in assigned area of specialization.
* Expert knowledge of the company offerings, strategic initiatives, current trends, competitor products and strategies within area of responsibility.
* Expert level written and verbal communication skills and mastery over English and local language.
* Demonstrates expert consultative selling techniques, including active listening, framing, white boarding, storytelling etc.
* Broad knowledge of partner´s and non\\-standard partner´s offerings and how/when to leverage them for deals within area of specialization.
* Strong project management knowledge or experience with excellent analytical and problem solving skills, including appropriate due diligence.
* Understand the correlation of model, parameter density, data density \\- with resulting compute and storage requirements (i.e. GPUs required for LSTM?)
* Understand the correlation between CPU, GPUs, memory for different types of models (i.e. instances where 8 GPUs better address the specific use case rather than 16 GPUs?)
* Ability to assess when is on\\-prem better than Cloud, or not.
* Understanding of how infrastructure scales as the model scales.
* Strong communicator, presenter and technologist evangelist
* Curiosity/interest in continuous learning to stay at the forefront of challenges which can be addressed through AI.

**Additional Skills:**


Accountability, Accountability, Active Learning, Active Listening, Assertiveness, Bias, Building Rapport, Buyer Personas, Coaching, Complex Sales, Creativity, Critical Thinking, Cross\\-Functional Teamwork, Customer Experience Strategy, Customer Interactions, Design Thinking, Empathy, Financial Acumen, Follow\\-Through, Growth Mindset, Identifying Sales Opportunities, Industry Knowledge, Intellectual Curiosity (Inactive), Long Term Planning, Managing Ambiguity {\\+ 6 more}**What We Can Offer You:**

**Health \\& Wellbeing**


We strive to provide our team members and their loved ones with a comprehensive suite of benefits that supports their physical, financial and emotional wellbeing.

**Personal \\& Professional Development**


We also invest in your career because the better you are, the better we all are. We have specific programs catered to helping you reach any career goals you have — whether you want to become a knowledge expert in your field or apply your skills to another division.

**Unconditional Inclusion**


We are unconditionally inclusive in the way we work and celebrate individual uniqueness. We know varied backgrounds are valued and succeed here. We have the flexibility to manage our work and personal needs. We make bold moves, together, and are a force for good.

**Let's Stay Connected:**


Follow @HPECareers on Instagram to see the latest on people, culture and tech at HPE.

title: Office Manager
description:

As Shamal Holding continues to grow, we’re in search of an **Office Manager \\- Development**. In this role you will provide high level administrative support and ensure smooth and efficient operation at the office. This includes managing schedules, coordinating meetings, handling correspondence, preparing reports and performing a variety of tasks that facilitate coordinating office activities, and serve as a liaison between different departments to facilitate effective communication and collaboration.

* Continuously improve office management processes for efficiency and productivity.

* Coordinating new joiner orientation and immersion for the respective team/department.

title: Database Administrator
description:
Netstratum is a global product development company specializing in custom software and enterprise IT services. With teams across ten global locations, we combine local insight with global expertise to deliver innovative, purpose\\-driven solutions.

As a leader in telecom tech, we build secure, high\\-performance Unified Communication Systems used by Tier\\-1 providers, enterprises, and governments. Our in\\-house AI platform is built for scale, security, and real\\-world impact.

Join a vibrant, diverse team working on cutting\\-edge projects in telecom, AI, IoT, and digital transformation—within a fast\\-paced, learning\\-focused environment.

**Location**: Dubai, UAE

**Experience**: 3\\+ Years

**Salary**: As per Industry Standards

**Job Code**: 092025/04

**Employment Type**: Full\\-time

**Job Description**

We are seeking a highly skilled Database Administrator with proven experience in managing and optimizing a company's Snowflake data platform, covering responsibilities such as performance tuning, security, data management, cost optimization, user access control, disaster recovery, and automation. Key duties of the position include designing and implementing database structures, monitoring for performance issues, managing security policies, supporting data pipelines, and collaborating with cross\\-functional teams to ensure data integrity and availability within the cloud environment.

**Responsibilities**

* **Platform Management:** Configure and maintain the Snowflake environment, including virtual warehouses, databases, and storage.
* **Performance \\& Optimization:** Monitor database performance, tune queries, and optimize resource usage for cost\\-efficiency and scalability.
* **Security \\& Compliance:** Implement and manage security measures, including data encryption, access controls, and network policies, to ensure compliance.
* **Data Operations:** Manage data loading, transformation, extraction (ETL/ELT) processes, and data governance.
* **User \\& Access Management:** Create and manage user accounts, roles, and privileges to ensure secure and appropriate access to data assets.
* **Disaster Recovery:** Plan, execute, and test disaster recovery strategies and data retention policies.
* **Automation:** Develop and implement automation for production deployments and routine database tasks.
* **Collaboration:** Work with data engineers, analysts, and IT teams to provide solutions, support data\\-related activities, and integrate Snowflake with other tools.
* **Monitoring \\& Troubleshooting:** Monitor database availability, performance, and query logs, and provide support to resolve issues.

**Key Skills and Qualifications**

* **Snowflake Expertise:** Strong understanding of Snowflake architecture, features, and best practices.
* **SQL Proficiency:** Deep knowledge of SQL for querying, data management, and performance tuning.
* **Cloud Knowledge:** Familiarity with cloud services (e.g., AWS) and cloud cost management.
* **Scripting \\& Automation:** Proficiency in scripting languages like Python or Bash and experience with tools like Terraform or CloudFormation.
* **Data Security:**  Knowledge of data security, encryption, access controls, and compliance frameworks.
* **Problem\\-Solving:** Strong analytical and troubleshooting skills.
* **Collaboration:** Excellent communication and teamwork abilities.

title: Contract Administrator - Emirati Talent
description:
**Company Description**  

CNS (Computer Network Systems) is a technology company in the middle\\-east \\& has over 30 years of successful achievements and long\\-term partnerships with distinct customers across the region.


We are an IT Integrator \\& our expertise are in Banking \\& Financial Service Insurance, Technology Enablement, IT Outsourcing, Cyber security, Digital Infrastructure, Hybrid Cloud, Digital Workplace, Customer Experience, Digital Transformation, and Block Chain.


We are a Part of the Ghobash Group of Companies, CNS spread across the region with offices in Abu Dhabi, Dubai, Oman, and Kuwait providing a holistic approach that covers all aspects of information communication technology system integration, consultancy, operation, managed services, and IT outsourcing.


CNS also has state\\-of\\-the\\-art network operation centers in Abu Dhabi and Dubai that develop in\\-house software and applications providing end\\-to\\-end solutions to our customers and partners.

 **Job Description**  

At Computer Network Systems, we believe in empowering our clients and stakeholders by evoking their rights and responsibilities through concise contracts. In order to seamlessly negotiate and execute contracts, we are seeking a highly skilled and certified contract Administrator. The candidate must be hands\\-on in every stage of the contract lifecycle, from drafting and negotiation to implementation and renewal. Our company firmly believes in operating within the regulations set by the government and the board of directors, so the contract Administrator in question must be knowledgeable regarding the laws and regulations surrounding each particular contract. By helping both parties meet the contractual obligations and stipulations, the ideal contract Administrator must look at the contract lifecycle from a holistic point of view, with accuracy, objectivity and integrity.


The Contracts Administrator (CM) will manage and provide a full range of pre\\-award, post\\-award and corporate contract administration services that will enable contract obligations to stakeholders and compliance to all applicable regulatory laws. The CM will guide the company’s understanding and keep the company abreast of client rules and regulations in order to support compliance. This position will report to the Head of Procurement \\& Contracts.  



**DUTIES \\& RESPONSIBILITIES**

* Draft, monitor and review contracts across various verticals and scales.
* Provide essential contract management services, by resolving conflicts, providing legal advice and renewing and redrafting contracts.
* Perform periodic reviews of the contracts in place and provide resolution services whenever a situation arises.
* Educate the stakeholders about their rights and responsibilities as per the conditions laid in the contract.
* Establish a contract management system to regulate contract workflow.
* Supervise the performance of the contract and work towards compliance with the terms and conditions mentioned in it.
* Communicate with internal and external stakeholders on the status of the contracts.
* Manages contract administration and compliance for all assigned projects.
* Distributes contract\\-related information and ensures the maintenance of contract files for assigned projects.
* Assists with the analysis and interpretation of contracts and advises on the negotiation of contracts with stakeholders when draft awards are received.
* Participates in project “kick\\-off” meetings, including delivering detailed briefings to the project and accounting teams as related to administration of the contract following the award.
* Assists with the Identification of any contractual or regulatory issues in RFPs that may impact potential new business opportunity, review cost proposals and ensure organizational and regulatory compliance.
* Participates in contract close\\-out efforts and escalates to the Head of Procurement \\& Contracts as needed.
* Drafts and negotiates subcontracts and modifications in consultation with the Head of Procurement \\& Contracts.
* Assists project teams in the preparation of subcontract solicitation documents and assists in management of the solicitation process as needed.
* Develops, negotiates, and modifies subcontracts, which includes conducting a risk analysis to determine any special conditions.
* Performs integrity checks for subcontract budgets for increase or decrease in scope of work and internal purpose and/or end of project pipeline budget.
* Draft and review teaming agreements with subs or primes.
* Develop templates for capture/proposal consultant agreements.
* Review and negotiate contracts with vendors as needed.
* Contributes to and reviews complex cost proposals to ensure that the bid is compliant with the solicitation and company’s policies.

  

**Qualifications** **Education:**

* Bachelor’s degree in Business Administration, Law, Public Administration, International Business, or a related field.

**Experience:**

* 5–7 years of relevant experience in contract management and/or business proposal pricing preparation.

**Skills \\& Abilities:**

* Fluency in English and Arabic.
* Comprehensive experience in contract administration, including award negotiations, subcontractor management, procurement, and performance auditing.
* Proficiency in Microsoft Excel, Word, and other essential computer applications.
* Strong oral and written communication skills.
* Excellent organizational skills with the ability to multitask, work independently, assess priorities, and manage multiple activities under tight deadlines and heavy workloads.
* Strong contract drafting and negotiation skills.
* High level of accuracy and attention to detail.
* Working knowledge of contract management systems or software.
* Familiarity with Oracle CRM, SAP ERP, Microsoft ERP, or similar platforms.

  

**Additional Information** *Compliance with policies and procedures based on the ISO standards adopted by CNS.*

title: Warranty Administrator
description:
**Job Summary:**

The Warranty Administrator is responsible for overseeing and processing warranty claims for automotive repairs and parts replacements. This role ensures compliance with manufacturer policies, coordinates with service and parts departments, and provides excellent customer service to resolve warranty\\-related inquiries and disputes. A strong understanding of automotive parts and service processes is crucial.

**Key Responsibilities: Warranty Claims Management:**

**Compliance \\& Documentation:**

**Key Skills and Competencies:**

title: Salesforce System Administrator
description:
**About the Company**  
Our client is a leading lifestyle management firm in Dubai, dedicated to delivering exclusive services to a distinguished high\\-net\\-worth clientele. * Strong problem\\-solving, analytical, and communication skills.

title: Hardware Engineer
description:
**Company Description**  

CNS (Computer Network Systems) is a technology company in the middle\\-east \\& has over 30 years of successful achievements and long\\-term partnerships with distinct customers across the region.


We are an IT distributor \\& our expertise are in Banking \\& Financial Service Insurance, Technology Enablement, IT Outsourcing, Cyber security, Digital Infrastructure, Hybrid Cloud, Digital Workplace, Customer Experience, Digital Transformation, and Block Chain.


We are a Part of the Ghobash Group of Companies, CNS spread across the region with offices in Abu Dhabi, Dubai, Oman, and Kuwait providing a holistic approach that covers all aspects of information communication technology system integration, consultancy, operation, managed services, and IT outsourcing.


CNS also has state\\-of\\-the\\-art network operation centers in Abu Dhabi and Dubai that develop in\\-house software and applications providing end\\-to\\-end solutions to our customers and partners.

 **Job Description**  

The ideal candidate will assist with the day\\-to\\-day management of IT systems and provide technical support to staff. As a Junior IT Specialist, you will be responsible for troubleshooting hardware and software issues, maintaining network systems, and ensuring the smooth operation of technology within the department.

**DUTIES \\& RESPONSIBILITIES:**

* **Provide First\\-Level Technical Support**
	+ Act as the initial point of contact for end\\-users experiencing hardware, software, or network issues.
	+ Troubleshoot and resolve technical problems in a timely and professional manner, escalating complex issues when necessary.
* **Install, Configure, and Maintain IT Equipment**
	+ Assist in the setup, configuration, and deployment of desktops, laptops, printers, and other peripherals.
	+ Install and update software applications and system tools to ensure compatibility and security.
* **Monitor and Maintain IT Systems**
	+ Support the daily operation of network systems, ensuring stable and secure connectivity.
	+ Perform routine maintenance to identify and resolve performance bottlenecks or potential failures.
* **User Account and Access Management**
	+ Assist in creating and managing user accounts, email setups, and access rights based on organizational policies.
* **Support IT Asset Management**
	+ Track and update inventory of IT hardware and software assets.
	+ Ensure proper documentation, tagging, and movement of IT equipment.
* **Assist in Network and Server Maintenance**
	+ Collaborate with network and system administrators to maintain server health and troubleshoot connectivity issues.
	+ Support basic backup and recovery procedures.
* **Ensure IT Security Compliance**
	+ Follow IT security policies during support operations, including password protection, software licensing, and antivirus updates.
	+ Report any suspected security incidents or breaches.
* **Maintain Technical Documentation**
	+ Document troubleshooting steps, solutions, system configurations, and FAQs to support knowledge sharing.
* **Support IT Projects and Upgrades**
	+ Participate in system upgrades, hardware rollouts, and software implementation projects.
	+ Assist in testing new tools or technologies as part of ongoing IT improvement efforts.
* **Deliver End\\-User Training and Guidance**
* Provide basic training to employees on IT tools, best practices, and new system functionalities.
* Support new employee onboarding by setting up workstations and providing system orientations.

  

**Qualifications** **Education**

* A degree or diploma in Information Technology or a related field

**Experience**


3 years relevant experience in IT support

**Skills \\& Abilities**

* Hardware support
* Operating Systems
* Software Installation \\& Configuration
* Networking basis
* Active directory and user management
* Remote support tools and ticketing systems.

  

**Additional Information** *Compliance with policies and procedures based on the ISO standards adopted by CNS.*

Job Description:

description:

title: (Senior) Full Stack Software Developer C# / .NET
description:
**(Senior) Full Stack Software Developer C\\# / .NET**

**Business Area / Department: R\\&D / Digitisation**

**Company / Location / Country: WOLFFKRAN ISS Ltd. (Dubai Branch), United Arab Emirates**

**Level of Seniority: Staff Member**

**Reports to: Head of Development and Construction / Segment Leader Electric**

**Job Description**

As a (Senior) Full Stack Software Developer (C\\# / .NET), you will be responsible for designing, developing, and maintaining internal engineering software used for the structural analysis, configuration, and digital monitoring of WOLFF tower cranes. You will collaborate closely with our global engineering and R\\&D teams, contributing to the digital transformation of tower crane technology using .NET Core, WPF, and modern architecture principles.

This position is based in the UAE. Applicants already located in the UAE or willing to relocate are encouraged to apply. Full training and onboarding support will be provided, including exposure to crane\\-specific engineering fundamentals. Both male and female candidates are welcome. A minimum 5\\-year commitment is expected due to the intensive training and long\\-term development involved in this role.

**Main and Secondary Tasks**

· Design, develop, and maintain specialized Windows applications for tower crane structural and mechanical calculations using C\\# / .NET Core

· Extend and optimize internal software architecture and performance modules

· Develop intuitive user interfaces with WPF / MVVM for engineering applications

· Integrate APIs and databases for crane configuration and performance analytics

· Write and maintain unit, integration, and regression tests

· Conduct code reviews and internal knowledge\\-sharing sessions

· Collaborate closely with structural engineers, electrical designers, and software developers

· Support digitisation projects for tower crane monitoring, telemetry, and predictive maintenance

**Required Education, Qualifications and Experience**

· Bachelor’s or Master’s degree in Computer Science, Software Engineering, IT, or a comparable qualification

· Excellent command of C\\# / .NET, object\\-oriented programming, and software architecture

· Experience with WPF and MVVM design patterns

· Minimum 5 years of professional experience in .NET software development

· Familiarity with design patterns, clean architecture, and modern development workflows

· Experience with Git, CI/CD, and collaborative version control

· Industry exposure to construction machinery, heavy equipment, or tower cranes is an advantage

· Strong analytical mindset and interest in learning crane\\-specific structural and mechanical concepts

· Good communication in English (spoken and written); basic German is an advantage

· Team\\-oriented, reliable, and self\\-motivated with high technical curiosity

**Other Points**

· Relocation support and training in WOLFFKRAN’s global R\\&D centres (Germany/Switzerland) may be provided

· Involvement in projects related to WOLFF Link, digital twin modelling, and structural simulation tools

title: Data Analytics Specialist
description:
##### **Job Purpose**

At Emirates Group, we connect the world through our global hub in Dubai, ensuring our customers always ‘Fly Better.’ As one of the most recognised and admired brands globally, we’re driven by innovation and excellence. Join us as a **Data Analytics Specialist** and play a key role in driving financial strategy and decision\\-making for a global business. Experience a fast\\-paced, multicultural environment where your financial expertise will be central to shaping the future of aviation while making a meaningful impact on a global stage.


As a **Data Analytics Specialist in Finance** , you will serve as the key link between Finance and the Enterprise Data Analytics (EDA) team, translating business requirements into impactful data solutions. You will design and deliver analytics products that enable data\\-driven decision\\-making through advanced visualisations, dashboards, and AI/ML\\-enabled insights. The role involves managing the Finance data roadmap, collaborating closely with IT, EDA, and other internal stakeholders to ensure timely delivery of data initiatives. You will also support major Finance projects and programmes by leveraging data from the Enterprise Data Platform to drive strategic and operational outcomes.


**In this role, you will:**

* Facilitate and support business requirements reviews for analytics initiatives, working closely with relevant teams to identify data sources, data capture needs, and business logic alignment.
* Project manage the development and delivery of the department’s data roadmap by collaborating across internal teams and stakeholders such as IT and Enterprise Data \\& Analytics (EDA).
* Oversee data modelling activities to ensure delivery of high\\-quality, reliable, and business\\-relevant data products that enable real\\-time decision\\-making.
* Conduct / oversee user acceptance testing (UAT) on EDA data captures, resolve data quality issues with EDA engineers, and confirm deployment readiness.
* Manage modelled data within the Enterprise Data Warehouse (Snowflake), including creation of custom data views and user role administration.
* Design and implement analytics solutions, delivering actionable insights through compelling visualisations using appropriate analytical tools such as Microsoft Power BI.
* Work alongside the Data Science team to implement AI and machine learning enabled analytics.
* Support major projects and programmes in Finance by providing relevant data from the Enterprise Data Platform.
* Champion data adoption and democratisation within Finance, supporting upskilling initiatives and conducting workshops or training sessions as required.
* Act as a data steward for governance and quality compliance, ensuring adherence to enterprise data standards.
* Develop hands\\-on expertise in data engineering tools and languages (e.g., Dataiku, Python) and data platforms (e.g., Snowflake) to support analysts in ad\\-hoc data capture and enrichment activities.

##### **Qualification**

**To be successful in this role, you must meet the below requirements:**

* Degree in a relevant field, such as Business Administration, Operational Research, Industrial Engineering, Information Technology etc.
* A minimum of 5 years of experience in IT and experience in Administration, General administration, Data Analytics, Reporting and Dashboard Implementation.
* Experience within a similar business area where there has been a strong focus on data analytics with 2 years in a supervisory role.
* Business Intelligence Knowledge and deep understanding of Power BI Platform and good knowledge on MicroStrategy tool.
* Good understanding on Data Science, Machine Learning and AI.
* Good understanding of Snowflake and SQL based data integration
Good understanding of Microsoft suite of data collaboration and process tools like Power Apps, Sharepoint.  
* 

  

**You'll have an edge if you have:**

* Experience with the implementation of initiatives that are transformational in nature.
* Good understanding on Data Governance and its documentation.
* Ability to understand different user groups needs and translate those into workable solutions suitable for all user groups.
* Experience of working in a multi\\-cultural expatriate environment.
* Project Management experience.
* Experience in Data Analytics in a Finance data domain.

At Emirates Group, we’re committed to providing our employees with opportunities to grow and develop in their careers. So if you’re looking for a challenging and rewarding opportunity, apply today and join our team.


##### **Salary \\& benefits**

Join us in Dubai and enjoy an attractive tax\\-free salary and travel benefits that are exclusive to our industry, including discounts on flights and hotels stays around the world. You can find more information about our employee benefits in the Working Here section of our website www.emirates.com/careers. Further information on what it’s like to live and work in our cosmopolitan home city, can be found in the Dubai Lifestyle section.

title: Senior Technical Engineer
description:
##### **Job Purpose**

A Emirates, we believe in connecting the world, to and through, our global hub in Dubai; and in constantly innovating to ensure our customers 'Fly better'.


As a **Senior Technical Engineer \\- Public Cloud** you will design, develop, support and deliver robust and cost\\-effective solutions for business the business and IT\\-led initiatives including solution development and cost estimations, configurations and deployment, business case development and approval. To support, contribute and ensure solution compliance to the enterprise architecture, production processes, QMS and other EGIT standards. Support, contribute and ensure the development of the roadmap of the concentrated technology roadmap aligning with the IT Strategy.


**In this role, you will:**

* Provide expert technical consultancy and guidance to EGIT dealing within the technology area and act as lead technical member in the project team delivering the work packages assigned.
* Develop IT Solutions that meet customer requirements. Ensure that the design is robust, appropriate and of high quality and conforming to corporate standards and in line with the technical strategy.
* Ensure that the developed architecture/solution meets the service level requirements in terms of expected availability, capacity, continuity, security, performance and reliability.
* Foster the development of high\\-performing technical teams to meet strategic architectural objectives.
* Develop solution architectures for assigned projects with the established EA standards and also support the development of technology advancements and adaptation of new technologies.
* Collaborate with other IT Technology teams to implement ongoing monitoring of the relevant technology to ensure level 1 \\& 2 incidents are configured within EMS.
* Guide Project Manager/Technology team managers for solution definition, technical design and development of in\\-house developed solutions. These are to be delivered as per agreed costs and timescales to meet signed\\-off functional, technical and process requirements.
* Ensure that assigned incidents are resolved within the agreed service levels and problems are defined and analysed in line with the Problem Management Process. Ensure that solutions to problems meet the architectural and security standards within the technology area and that impact on the business is minimised. Own and manage changes within the technology area.
* Publish and maintain high\\-quality documentation for the technology area. Working within the standard templates and documentation guidelines which includes detailed design, configuration details, support procedures, operations manuals and deployments architecture.

Ensure the process and enhancement specifications are translated into effective programs with error\\-free code using the enterprise development tools, methods and languages.

* Ability to create clear and concise technical documentation.
Integration experience with DevOps and CI/CD pipelines. Experience operating large public cloud footprints and onboarding new applications using Devops practices.  
* 

  

Join our Public Clouds team and become part of a dynamic, high\\-performing group of experts dedicated to advancing our cloud footprint, unlocking native capabilities, and automating our services. With long\\-standing partnerships with leading hyperscalers and key workloads hosted globally, we are looking to expand our team with innovative cloud experts who will help elevate our cloud posture and drive end\\-to\\-end automation. If you are passionate about cloud technology and automation, we invite you to apply and to contribute to the success of Emirates Group.

title: Senior Software Engineer
description:
##### **Job Purpose**

At Emirates, we believe in connecting the world to and through our global hub in Dubai and in constantly innovating to ensure our customers Fly Better.


Emirates Group IT thrives on the dynamic nature of technology. Being pioneers in aviation innovation, we're always at the forefront, pushing boundaries. We're on the lookout for exceptional IT professionals to fortify our position as leaders in the industry. Embark on a journey with the world’s largest international airline and become a vital part of our cutting\\-edge information and technology team as a **Senior Software Engineer \\- Oracle ERP \\- HR.**

The Senior Software Engineer is a fully participating member of an agile feature team working independently on software development and problem resolution. The role involves technical design, software development, implementation, and maintenance of software solutions/products that support the Emirates Group Business.


**In this role, you will:**

* Work with senior technical engineers in the technical design process by contributing to the analysis of technical application requirements.

* Be responsible for building in quality and ensuring 100% unit testing as part of the CI/CD pipeline.
* Analyse and fix all identified defects with minimal rework.
* Ensure refactoring practices are adequately adopted to ensure minimum code debt.
* Ensure logging and monitoring hooks are implemented as part of the code development.
* Continuously stay up to date with the relevant technologies, and implement the learnings to enhance the code quality.

##### **Qualification**

* Experience in Oracle Application Framework (OAF).
* Proficiency in PL/SQL, Oracle Workflows, and XML Publisher.

* Familiarity with Oracle Access Manager.

* Familiarity with exposing RESTful APIs through an integrated SOA Gateway.

* Knowledge of Agile development methodologies.

**Leadership Role:** No


##### **Salary \\& benefits**

Join us in Dubai and enjoy an attractive tax\\-free salary and travel benefits that are exclusive to our industry, including discounts on flights and hotel stays around the world. Find out what it’s like to live and work in our fast\\-paced, cosmopolitan home city in the Dubai Lifestyle section of our website www.emirates.com/careers .

title: Senior Engineer- Traffic (guide signs, traffic signs, road markings)
description:
**Company Description**  

This is for our client. Our hybrid work model empowers you to choose where you work—whether it's from the office, your home, or a mix of both—so you can prioritize what matters most. We are committed to supporting your personal goals, family, and overall well\\-being while driving transformative results for our clients.

  

We welcome exceptional talent from anywhere across the globe. Interviews and onboarding are conducted virtually, reflecting our digital\\-first mindset.

  

Rooted in the region, we specialize in delivering tailored, impactful solutions in Data, Advanced Analytics and AI, Infrastructure, Cloud Security, and Application Modernization. Whether it’s enabling predictive analytics, transforming operations with automation, or driving customer engagement with intelligent platforms, we are the trusted partner for organizations ready to embrace a smarter, more efficient future.

 **Job Description**  

\\# Study and review all types of traffic diversions, including engineering plans, in terms of design and execution of traffic signs, guide signs, and road markings through relevant electronic systems. Review the details of temporary traffic signs and conduct field visits when implementing major diversions to ensure the implementation of plans and specifications at the worksite, ensuring compliance with approved standards and guidelines  

\\# Study the engineering and technical details of traffic signs, guide signs, road markings, house numbering signs, and street signs, including their aspects and structural components, in terms of engineering plans. This includes measurements and materials used, to ensure compliance with the specifications and standards followed by the Roads and Transport Authority, based on the Traffic Control Manual for Dubai. Study the outputs of traffic impact studies to apply the relevant standards and technical specifications for traffic signs, guide signs, and road markings, in accordance with the requirements of the Traffic Impact Study Guide in the  

Authority  

\\# Study and analyze engineering studies and important projects related to providing traffic control devices, traffic signs, guidance signs, road markings, and information integration between different modes of transportation and infrastructure, including buses, metro, trams, bicycles, and electric scooters  

\\# Review, study, and issue No Objection Certificates for traffic signs and advertising signs through the electronic No Objection Certificate system, applying approved technical specifications and standards according to the applicable guidelines  

\\# Participate in developing innovative solutions and ideas to promote sustainable mobility by enhancing the use of traffic control and signage. Participate in several committees within and outside the authority and effectively follow up on their issued decisions  

\\# Measure the specialized performance indicators of the department and develop improvement procedures related to the guidance and traffic signs system in coordination with relevant institutions in the authority. Participate in developing operations and action plans related to the work and respond to internal audit comments regularly  

\\# Participate in the study of qualifying consultants and contractors working in the field of traffic and guidance signs and follow up and evaluate their work  

\\# Develop engineering and technical specifications related to the materials used and provide necessary approvals during the implementation phase. Supervise and audit the quality of work  

\\# Study the engineering plans for traffic signs, guide signs, and road markings for road projects under the Roads and Transport Authority, as well as private projects. This includes studying the design of bicycle paths and flexible mobility areas. Additionally, study and update the general and detailed plans for implementing a comprehensive addressing system across Dubai. Monitor the implementation of these plans in the field, audit the quality of the work, and study maintenance requests and plans for traffic signs and guide signs for the Road Maintenance and Facilities Management Department. This includes all stages of design, planning, and execution  

\\# Study and review the engineering studies for road projects, bicycle paths, and the development of internal streets in residential areas subject to the implementation of the flexible mobility system. Ensure their compliance with updated technical guidelines and the approved engineering regulatory plans by the senior management  

\\# Study and review requests for issuing permits for supplementary and advertising guide signs, as well as renewing them, through relevant electronic systems. Additionally, approving the engineering plans that include the locations and technical details of these signs after the necessary permits have been issued to qualified establishments in accordance with the procedures followed by the Authority, laws, and regulations. Conducting relevant field visits to ensure their implementation on\\-site according to the approved plans, supervising and auditing the quality of work  

\\# Comply with the policies of the authority regarding partners, customers, suppliers, and employees, and carry out tasks and responsibilities in accordance with the code of ethics at the authority  

\\# Participate in the study to update the traffic control devices manual. Continuously monitor the development of the guidance signage system and addressing system, including coordination with developers and external entities  

\\# Perform other duties and responsibilities related to the job and as assigned  

* Strictly Adhere to client Information Security policies, procedures, and processes.
* Strictly follow the Information Security data sharing guidelines for all internal and external data transfers.
* Immediately report any Information Security incidents to your line manager and IT support for prompt guidance and resolution.
* Actively participate in all assigned Information Security training and awareness sessions to enhance your knowledge and address potential Information Security risks.
* Always comply with instructions and guidance provided by your line manager in line to the Information .
 **Qualifications**  

Education


\\# Bachelor’s degree in civil engineering/ Transportation engineering or its equivalent from an accredited university. 5 years of working experience


Skills


\\# Good knowledge of transportation planning, integration, principles, policies, legislation, practices, and theories \\- Knowledge of technical guidelines for designing transportation modes, signs, guidance for pedestrian crossings, and the needs of people with disabilities \\- Analytical thinking and demonstrated talent in identifying, examining, improving, and simplifying multiple work procedures \\- Proficient computer user with mastery of multiple software covering a wide range of applications \\- Good listener and communicator with high ability to convey information orally and in writing \\- Active team member capable of building trust in relationships with clients and team members \\- Ability to adapt within a team and in a work environment that requires effective prioritization and coordination of concurrent projects and tasks \\- Innovative problem\\-solving skills and ability to provide practical and effective solutions \\- Achievement\\-oriented and result\\-focused, with great planning and organization.

title: Associate Director - Structural
description:
**Company Description** **Work with Us. Change the World.**


At AECOM, we're delivering a better world. Whether improving your commute, keeping the lights on, providing access to clean water, or transforming skylines, our work helps people and communities thrive. We are the world's trusted infrastructure consulting firm, partnering with clients to solve the world’s most complex challenges and build legacies for future generations.


There has never been a better time to be at AECOM. With accelerating infrastructure investment worldwide, our services are in great demand. We invite you to bring your bold ideas and big dreams and become part of a global team of over 50,000 planners, designers, engineers, scientists, digital innovators, program and construction managers and other professionals delivering projects that create a positive and tangible impact around the world.


We're one global team driven by our common purpose to deliver a better world. Join us.

 **Job Description**  

AECOM is seeking Associate Director \\- Structures, to be based in Dubai, UAE. The Associate Director will be responsible to lead the team to produce the design information and coordinate with the relevant design disciplines. He/She will be responsible to provide technical reviews and quality management, share technical expertise and experience with others in the company via internal technical communication and presentations.


Design will be carried out in accordance with AASHTO LRFD, Eurocodes, AREMA and or any other international design code as applicable. As a leader, he/she will be also responsible to coordinate with the Client and the key stakeholders of the projects. He/she will be also required to travel when required to address the projects and Clients needs, in particular within GCC. He/She may be assigned, if required, to undertake some site inspections.

**Job Duties**

* Development of feasibility and design concepts,
* Undertaking the lead for carrying out all design stages design of all types of bridges, and underground structures including cut and cover tunnels, box jacking tunnels, underground stations, and other forms of underground structures.
* Provide technical leadership on structural design tasks.
* Having good understanding and appreciation for other disciplines requirements of the underground structures such as the geotechnical, MEP and FLS requirements.
* Having reasonable knowledge about life cycle cost analysis of underground structures.
* Develops solutions to complex and challenging issues using engineering methodologies to define new procedures when needed.
* Liaise with CAD/BIM Manager for production of drawings and BIM models.
* Responsible to coordinate with the other disciplines to ensure there are no design gaps and provide fully coordinated design deliverables. This includes the support of the construction supervision teams.
* Resolves technical issues concerning conflicting requirements or complex coordination.
* Performs quality control reviews of design calculations and drawings following policies and procedures confirming that the technical approach satisfies the client scope of services and expectations.
* Provides specialized input to studies and design within the area of underground structures.
* Carry out risk assessments and provision of design information for Health and Safety.
* Inspection, assessment and strengthening of underground structures where applicable.
* Report writing and production of technical reports, specifications, and documents.
* Championing innovation and demonstrating technical leadership to sizeable team.
* Able to monitor and track the budget for specific tasks within the project.
* Plays an active role in the technical development of the team.
* Contributes as an in\\-house expert on specific technologies or processes.
* Independently evaluates, selects, and applies standard industry techniques to execute work assignments.
* Identifies and develops new processes that lead to improved efficiency or work quality.
* Engages with project technical teams within a field of expertise to confirm project approach and review deliverables within budget and scope.
* Liaises with authorities to obtain permits and approvals and to discuss technical advances.
* Develops construction cost estimates and estimates of technical effort/man\\-hours for projects.
* May be required to act as Project Manager on small to medium size discipline\\-specific projects. Has an excellent understanding of project delivery requirements.
* Supports business development and selling initiatives to expand work assignments, including managing client relationships and expectations.
* Assists with proposals and participates in the development of bids and technical write\\-up for proposals.
* Leads communication with clients to discuss work scope, requests information to support project execution and receives client comments on draft work products.
* Presents to clients, senior leadership and other project stakeholders to demonstrate progress and clearly explains design principles.

 **Qualifications** **Qualification**

* Bachelor of Science or Engineering from an accredited University a relevant subject such as Civil or Structural Engineering.
* Master of Science/Engineering is preferred, PhD is highly preferred
* Chartered Engineer (MIStructE, or C.Eng. from UK) or Professional Engineer (PE from USA) is highly preferred.
* PMP, RMP or equivalent Project management certificate is preferred.

**Specific Skills Required**

* Must have minimum of 15\\+ years of hands\\-on extensive experience in Structural Engineers of Bridges, transportation structures, and infrastructure structures. UAE/ME projects experience would be preferred.
* Experience with various software packages for analysis and design such as Midas, STAAD, SAP, RM Bridges.
* Organized and proactive
* Exceptional communication and interpersonal skills.

  

**Additional Information** **About AECOM**


AECOM is proud to offer comprehensive benefits to meet the diverse needs of our employees. Depending on your employment status, AECOM benefits may include medical, dental, vision, life, AD\\&D, disability benefits, paid time off, leaves of absences, voluntary benefits, perks, flexible work options, well\\-being resources, employee assistance program, business travel insurance, service recognition awards, retirement savings plan, and employee stock purchase plan.


AECOM is the global infrastructure leader, committed to delivering a better world. As a trusted professional services firm powered by deep technical abilities, we solve our clients’ complex challenges in water, environment, energy, transportation and buildings. Our teams partner with public\\- and private\\-sector clients to create innovative, sustainable and resilient solutions throughout the project lifecycle – from advisory, planning, design and engineering to program and construction management. AECOM is a Fortune 500 firm that had revenue of $16\\.1 billion in fiscal year 2024\\. Learn more at aecom.com.

**What makes AECOM a great place to work**


You will be part of a global team that champions your growth and career ambitions. Work on groundbreaking projects \\- both in your local community and on a global scale \\- that are transforming our industry and shaping the future. With cutting\\-edge technology and a network of experts, you’ll have the resources to make a real impact. Our award\\-winning training and development programs are designed to expand your technical expertise and leadership skills, helping you build the career you’ve always envisioned. Here, you’ll find a welcoming workplace built on respect, collaboration and community \\- where you have the freedom to grow in a world of opportunity.


As an Equal Opportunity Employer, we believe in your potential and are here to help you achieve it. All your information will be kept confidential according to EEO guidelines.

title: Head of Enhancement Projects Support
description:
The Head of Enhancement Projects Support will lead and coordinate support for Enhancement Projects managed by the RTA Rail Planning and Project Department (RPPD) on Dubai Metro Red Line and Green Line. This position aims to provide governance, planning, and stakeholder management to ensure effective mobilisation of resources and coordination with the RTA and the Project Contractors  


**KEY RESPONSIBILITIES**


**Strategic**  


* Serve as focal point of contact for Keolis MHI on the Enhancement Projects managed by RTA RPPD.
* Assess and mitigate all risks on existing Operations and Maintenance during all phases of the Projects (Design, Installation, Testing \\& Commissioning and Warranty).
* Drive constructive and proactive coordination between Keolis MHI, RTA and the Contractor to ensure On\\-Time Delivery of the Enhancement Projects.
* Review priority, plan, and sequence project activities within a defined capital delivery roadmap.
* Establish and enforce standardized governance across all project phases based on ISO 21500/PMI.
* Own the project support portfolio dashboard and ensure risk\\-adjusted decision\\-making at key stage gates

  


**Financial**  


* Ensure budget forecasting, cost control and commercial oversight across the different project’s phases.
* Coordinate commercial and procurement strategies with Finance, Legal, and Procurement teams.
* Lead strategic contract management, focusing on value, delivery, and risk exposure

  


**Stakeholder / Customer**  


* Serve as key coordination point with RTA RPPD and Contractors for programme oversight and approvals.
* Ensure alignment across KM departments (Operations, Engineering \\& Maintenance, QHSE, Learning \\& Development).
* Prepare and deliver timely updates on progress, risks, and required decisions.

  


**Operational**  



* Manage the scope of works as it is developed to support Enhancement Projects:


* Facilitating the Change Management process
* Facilitating the Permit to Work process and access to stations and technical rooms for contractor staff
* Monitoring works on Legacy network to ensure no impact to Operations and Passenger Comfort
* Ensuring safety and security of Dubai Metro is maintained during enhancement works
* Supporting contractor planning for lineside access if required
* Completing Safety and System Assurance activities from the Operators' perspective
* Assessing contractor activities to avoid disturbance to operational service
* Supporting the decommissioning process of Dubai Metro assets
* Attending meetings with RTA, Engineer, and Contractor as required
* Preparing monthly progress reports and lesson learnt documentation
* Drive performance management using key metrics.
* Monitor the delivery of each Keolis MHI department (Learning \\& Development, Engineering \\& Maintenance, Operations and QHSE), ensuring:
* Quality, Change Management (ACCA), Permit To Work (PTW) and risk management procedures are consistently applied.
* Project handovers delivered (with lessons learned).
* Contractor /vendor alignment and contractual/commercial programme oversights processes.


 3\\. Resolve high\\-impact issues, escalate decisions as required, and provide executive direction to project teams

  


**Capability/People**  


* Develop delivery competencies and knowledge sharing within the Enhancement Projects support team.
* Foster accountability, collaboration, and continuous improvement across functions.

  


**Dimensions**  


* Project Value: AED 200M–400M.
* Team Size: \\~10–20 delivery professionals and functional contributors.
* Reporting: Weekly RTA meeting/ Bi\\-Weekly Steering Committee / Monthly project progress, KPIs to Project and Innovation Director and the executive team.
* Office\\-based with site inspections (during and after office hours), presence during key delivery phases and stakeholder visits.
* Occasional travel will be required (Europe/ Other).

  


**MINIMUM QUAIFICATIONS**

  



Min.  


Required  


Desirable  


Education  


* Bachelor’s in engineering or equivalent.


* Project Management
* Bachelor or equivalent in project Management


* Project Management certification (PMP or PRINCE2\\)
  

  

Experience  


Experience in large scale capital projects with a proven track record of leading high\\-performing project teams.

Construction/ Metro/rail sector experience.  


In Transportation company

Involvement in building/ operational project

International experience  


Skills / Training  


Proven stakeholder coordination and project governance skills.

English fluency  


Arabic is a \\+

title: Graphics Designer (UAE National)
description:
In a world of possibilities, pursue one with endless opportunities. Imagine Next!


When it comes to what you want in your career, if you can imagine it, you can do it at Parsons. Imagine a career working with intelligent, diverse people sharing a common quest. Imagine a workplace where you can be yourself. Where you can thrive. Where you can find your next, right now. We’ve got what you’re looking for.


**Job Description:**

**Graphic Designer (UAE National)**

**Dubai, UAE**

Be part of a world\\-class, innovation\\-driven engineering design team that values creativity and excellence. In this role, you’ll leverage your artistic and graphic design skills to provide creative support for technically complex and impactful infrastructure projects.


**What You'll Be Doing:**
